positive_passages.title: Quality Park #10 Self-Seal Security Envelopes, Security Tint and Pattern, Redi-Strip Closure, 24-lb White Wove, 4-1/8" x 9-1/2", 100/Box (QUA69117)
positive_passages.text: Product Description Quality Park #10 Security Envelopes have a strong peel & stick closure that seals fast without applying moisture. Our heavy opaque envelope stock is printed with a security tint that makes envelopes difficult to see through. A complex security pattern scrambles the appearance of numbers and text. Plus, Redi-Strip envelopes have a long shelf-life thanks to the paper strip that protects your adhesive from dust. Bright 24-lb. white wove paper is perfect for use at home or at work. 4-1/8 x 9-1/2 inches. Redi-Strip Envelope Closure. 24-lb White Wove. 100 Per Box. Strong, Fast and Efficient: Redi-Strip envelopes save time and increase efficiency with a removable strip and strong adhesive seal that ends the hassle of everyday mail duty. To close them, simply peel and press. Protected & Secure: Guard sensitive data with a security tint makes envelopes difficult to see through. A complex security pattern scrambles the appearance of numbers and text. These extra security features are essential for sending checks or personally identifiable information (PII) through the mail. Eliminate the Yuck Factor: We promise you won't miss licking envelopes or those drippy moistener sponges in a cup! Redi-Strip envelopes bring mailing into the modern era with a tidier, more hygienic and still very affordable alternative to standard envelopes. Long Lasting in Storage: The peelable paper strip is not only convenient, it protects your adhesive from dust so envelopes last longer. Bright White Elegance: 24-lb. white wove paper gives your everyday mailings a professional finish. Ideal for business or personal correspondence. Stock Up for Busy Season: Keep several boxes of this necessity on hand. Stock Up for Busy Season: Keep several boxes of this necessity on hand.From the manufacturer The Quality Park Advantage Quality Park envelopes offer a comprehensive selection of business envelopes with superior features. We work tirelessly to give you the best for your hard-earned dollar, carefully designing envelopes with time-saving convenience features and high quality materials that still keep your budget in mind. You get a quality product with Quality Park affordability. Read more Styles and Features Business Envelopes Quality Park envelopes are a trusted staple in the office, providing hundreds of business-ready envelope styles in sizes and weights to fit every need and industry. We offer the standard #10 envelopes you rely on for direct mail and correspondence; security-tinted window and double-window envelopes to fit billing statements, paychecks and receipts; claim form envelopes for hospitals and physicians; and every business need under the sun. Mail more economically and efficiently with quality stock and quality features from Quality Park envelopes. Enhanced Security Protect yourself and customer/client data with security features that keep personal information confidential while in transit. A security tint makes envelopes difficult to see through; a complex security pattern scrambles the appearance of text for added protection. Use to shield social security numbers, PINs, checks, statements, invoices or health data. Convenient Self-Sealing Closures Redi-Strip envelopes increase efficiency with removable strips and adhesives that seal without moisture—simply peel and press. These time-savers eliminate the hassle of everyday and large bulk mailings. Plus, the peelable strips protect resin adhesives from dust, so envelopes last longer in storage. Redi-Seal no-moisture envelopes have a unique double-flap closure that prevents adhesives from sticking prematurely. You won’t find ruined envelopes in your box! Read more Announcement Envelopes Lest you think we’re all business, Quality Park A-style announcement envelopes provide quick, cost-saving alternatives for invitations & announcements. You’re in full control of event costs with quality paper selections at a Quality Park price; perfect for when your budget and your timeline are tight. Catalog And Booklet Envelopesa Our horizontal and vertical envelopes have closures to suit every purpose. Large envelopes have heavy adhesives to protect bulky contents. Durable metal clasp, string-and-button and resealable-tape styles offer an economical solution for inter-office mail. From jumbo envelopes with gummed or plain flaps, to coin envelopes for keys, you’ll find just the right closure at Quality Park. Read more

positive_passages.title: 50 Business Envelopes, Standard Flap (Multi Color Pack, 9.5" x 4.125")
positive_passages.text: Product Description We have what it takes to satisfy your image-conscious stationery and mailing needs that best fit with these envelopes because of its simple yet classic design. It features a bright cream colored, smooth and level printing surface for superior ink holdout and fast drying with a great result of vibrant full-colored prints in front and back of the envelopes, printed on a high-tech digital press. This surely stands out all the plain ones and gets the attention all you need to your recipients These cream-colored envelopes bring value and professionalism to your personal and business communications with its clean and polished presentation which letting you affix printed or handwritten labels to ensure accurate addressing of your correspondence. It’s windowless and non-see through tint features that added security and protection to keep the privacy and confidentiality to your mailing content. Easy sealing with its gummed flap that dries non-sticky and can be reactivated after remoistening, unlike other industrial adhesive seals that are incredibly sticky and has a habit of sticking when and where they are not wanted; causing damage to the envelope itself. Less waste generated compared to a PnS envelope where you have to remove the backing. Start mailing your invoices and statements with confidence and unique style with these #10 envelopes that are engineered to deliver a secure and hassle-free mailing experience. It comes with a standard measurement of 4.125 x 9.5 inches that fits the smaller envelopes inside such as #9 or #6 ¾ size and holds folded letters. They are made of a high-end grade paperwhite stock of 70lb premium uncoated text in a non-glossy finish. It’s not your ordinary envelopes that you thought, its non-flimsy and premium quality thicker paper! positive_passages.title: Quality Park #8 Double Window Security Envelopes for QuickBooks Checks, Redi-Strip Self Seal Closure, 3 5/8 x 8 11/16, 24 lb White, 500/Box (QUA50766)
positive_passages.text: Product Description Quality Park #8 Double Window Envelopes are custom built to fit QuickBooks and other computer generated checks. Careful window placement shows only the sender and receiver addresses while check amounts and other data remain private and protected. This slightly wider envelope comfortably accepts the somewhat wider laser business checks format. We promise you won't miss licking laser check envelopes or those drippy moistener sponges in a cup. Redi Strip self seal envelopes bring your mailings into the modern era with a tidy, clean alternative to standard envelopes. Just peel and press for a durable seal. Plus, the peelable strip protects your adhesive from dust so envelopes last longer in storage. Our security envelopes for QuickBooks checks have a reflex blue tint with safety pattern to protect sensitive information; shields contents from prying eyes, even when held to light. Quality Park business envelopes are made of 24 lb white wove paper with side seams to create bright, professional envelopes for mailing. Available in boxes of 500 to quickly stock your workplace, small business or home office. Envelope dimensions are 3 5/8 x 8 11/16 inches overall. Top window measures 7/8 x 3-1/2 inches, 3/8 inches from the left and 2 3/8 inches from the bottom. Bottom window measures 7/8 x 3 1/2 inches, 7/8 inch from the left and 3/4 of an inch from the bottom. Our invoice envelopes are designed to immediately create a strong seal so you do not have to worry about your contents being exposed to others. negative_passages.text: Product Description Window envelope helps to ensure your documents arrive at their proper location. Self-stick adhesive—double flap design keeps flap from sticking until ready to mail. White wove exterior adds a professional touch. Product Description Window envelope helps to ensure your documents arrive at their proper location. Self-stick adhesive—double flap design keeps flap from sticking until ready to mail. White wove exterior adds a professional touch.From the manufacturer The Quality Park Advantage Quality Park envelopes offer a comprehensive selection of business envelopes with superior features. We work tirelessly to give you the best for your hard-earned dollar, carefully designing envelopes with time-saving convenience features and high quality materials that still keep your budget in mind. You get a quality product with Quality Park affordability. Read more #10 Left Window Security Tinted Business Envelopes with Self Seal Closure Enhanced Privacy Features Protect sensitive client information with these security tinted envelopes. The reflex blue pattern lining the envelope's interior makes it impossible to see the details of the contents, even when held up to the light. Mail invoices, statements and other important documents with confidence. Redi-Seal Self Adhesive Closure With the Redi-Seal closure, envelopes do not require moisture to seal. The unique double-flap design keeps the gum from sticking before use. Simply raise the lower flap and press to seal. Convenient Left Window Instead of printing the contents and the envelopes with an address, use the window to show pertinent information. Display the receiver addresses through the window. Positioned to fit most invoice address layouts, this left side window envelope makes sure the document is delivered straight into the customer's hands! The window (1-1/8" x 4-1/2") is positioned 7/8" from left and 1/2" from bottom. Designed for standard business mailings Substantial 24 lb. White Wove Paper Measures 4-1/8" x 9-1/2" Side seam design for easy insertion 500 envelopes per box Read more Left Window Security Tinted Business Envelopes with Self Seal Closure #10, 24 lb. White Wove, 4-1/8" x 9-1/2", 500/Box, (21418). Read more Styles and Features Business Envelopes Quality Park envelopes are a trusted staple in the office, providing hundreds of business-ready envelope styles in sizes and weights to fit every need and industry. We offer the standard #10 envelopes you rely on for direct mail and correspondence; security-tinted window and double-window envelopes to fit billing statements, paychecks and receipts; claim form envelopes for hospitals and physicians; and every business need under the sun. Mail more economically and efficiently with quality stock and quality features from Quality Park envelopes. Enhanced Security Protect yourself and customer/client data with security features that keep personal information confidential while in transit. A security tint makes envelopes difficult to see through; a complex security pattern scrambles the appearance of text for added protection. Use to shield social security numbers, PINs, checks, statements, invoices or health data. Convenient Self-Sealing Closures Redi-StripP envelopes increase efficiency with removable strips and adhesives that seal without moisture—simply peel and press. These time-savers eliminate the hassle of everyday and large bulk mailings. Plus, the peelable strips protect resin adhesives from dust, so envelopes last longer in storage. Redi-Seal no-moisture envelopes have a unique double-flap closure that prevents adhesives from sticking prematurely. You won’t find ruined envelopes in your box! Read more Announcement Envelopes Lest you think we’re all business, Quality Park A-style announcement envelopes provide quick, cost-saving alternatives for invitations & announcements. You’re in full control of event costs with quality paper selections at a Quality Park price; perfect for when your budget and your timeline are tight. Catalog and Booklet Envelopes Our horizontal and vertical envelopes have closures to suit every purpose. Large envelopes have heavy adhesives to protect bulky contents. Durable metal clasp, string-and-button and resealable-tape styles offer an economical solution for inter-office mail. From jumbo envelopes with gummed or plain flaps, to coin envelopes for keys, you’ll find just the right closure at Quality Park. Read more

Some will show the recipient's address but not the sender's address, while others will hide parts of the addresses, and worse, others will show parts of the check like the check amount, or check memo. negative_passages.text: Product Description Quality Park 9 x 12 Catalog Envelopes have a peel & seal closure that adheres without applying moisture. These welcome time savers for bulk mailings have a longer shelf-life than standard envelopes thanks to the peelable paper strip that protects the flap’s adhesive from dust. Large REDI-STRIP envelopes are perfect for storing and mailing catalogs, 8 x 10 photos or full letter-sized documents without folds and creases. Heavy 28-lb white wove paper gives every correspondence a professional look and finish. 9 x 12 inch Catalog Envelopes. REDI-STRIP Envelope Closure. 28-lb White Wove. 100 Per Box. Mail Flat Without Folds: Don't settle for bulky, stuffed #10 envelopes or more expensive oversized flats; this 9 x 12 is the perfect compromise for cost-effective, professional-looking mailings with a little room to spare. Ideal for contracts, catalogs, registration packets, large photos and other correspondence. Get Mailings Gone, ASAP: REDI-STRIP envelopes save time and increase efficiency with a removable strip that eliminates the hassle of everyday mail duty and large bulk mailings. Simply peel and press. Eliminate the Yuck Factor: We promise you won't miss licking envelopes or those drippy moistener sponges in a cup! REDI-STRIP envelopes bring mailing into the modern era with a tidier, more hygienic alternative to standard envelopes. Plus, the peelable strip protects your adhesive from dust so envelopes last longer in storage. Classic White Wove Elegance: 28-lb White wove paper gives your large envelope mailings more polish than basic kraft. This heavy-weight stock is opaque to protect private contents. Use with address labels or laser print for a finished look at a fraction of the cost of custom printing. Think Ahead & Stock Up: REDI-STRIP envelopes are a popular office staple for your "never out" list. Stock up now for intra-office communications, bulk mail projects, sort & organize missions, or everyday needs for home & office. Stock up now for intra-office communications, bulk mail projects, sort & organize missions, or everyday needs for home & office.From the manufacturer The Quality Park Advantage Quality Park envelopes offer a comprehensive selection of business envelopes with superior features. We work tirelessly to give you the best for your hard-earned dollar, carefully designing envelopes with time-saving convenience features and high quality materials that still keep your budget in mind. You get a quality product with Quality Park affordability. Read more 9 x 12 Self Seal Catalog Envelope for Document Mailing Redi-Seal Self Adhesive Closure Perfect for everyday business use, Quality Park's 9 x 12 catalog envelopes are designed with a strong self seal adhesive strip to create a full, secure seal that won't open or tear. The peel-off strip protects the adhesive from dust for a longer shelf life. Simply remove the strip and press for a clean, quick seal immediately upon contact. Heavy 28 lb. White Wove Paper Stock These envelopes are made with a heavy weight, high quality 28 lb. white wove stock for a professional look and finish. 28 lb. white wove paper prevents show-through, making the contents of the envelope less visible. Perfect for Mailing & Storing Documents Quality Park's 9 x 12 Catalog envelopes with Redi-Strip closure are the perfect choice for mailing catalogs, documents, photos and other business mailings. They are also great for storage. When you don't want to fold your document, our 9 x 12 catalog envelope is the way to go. Removable strip provides a clean, quick seal immediately upon contact Peel-off strip protects adhesives from dust for longer shelf life Durable 28 lb. White Wove 100 catalog envelopes per box Read more Styles and Features Business Envelopes Quality Park envelopes are a trusted staple in the office, providing hundreds of business-ready envelope styles in sizes and weights to fit every need and industry. We offer the standard #10 envelopes you rely on for direct mail and correspondence; security-tinted window and double-window envelopes to fit billing statements, paychecks and receipts; claim form envelopes for hospitals and physicians; and every business need under the sun. Mail more economically and efficiently with quality stock and quality features from Quality Park envelopes. Enhanced Security Protect yourself and customer/client data with security features that keep personal information confidential while in transit. A security tint makes envelopes difficult to see through; a complex security pattern scrambles the appearance of text for added protection. Use to shield social security numbers, PINs, checks, statements, invoices or health data. Convenient Self-sealing Closures Redi-strip envelopes increase efficiency with removable strips and adhesives that seal without moisture—simply peel and press. These time-savers eliminate the hassle of everyday and large bulk mailings. Plus, the peelable strips protect resin adhesives from dust, so envelopes last longer in storage. Redi-seal no-moisture envelopes have a unique double-flap closure that prevents adhesives from sticking prematurely. You won’t find ruined envelopes in your box! Read more Announcement Envelopes Lest you think we’re all business, Quality Park A-style announcement envelopes provide quick, cost-saving alternatives for invitations & announcements. You’re in full control of event costs with quality paper selections at a Quality Park price; perfect for when your budget and your timeline are tight. Catalog And Booklet Envelopes Our horizontal and vertical envelopes have closures to suit every purpose. Large envelopes have heavy adhesives to protect bulky contents. Durable metal clasp, string-and-button and resealable-tape styles offer an economical solution for inter-office mail. From jumbo envelopes with gummed or plain flaps, to coin envelopes for keys, you’ll find just the right closure at Quality Park. Read more

negative_passages.text: Product Description Your QuickBooks Printed Checks will Line up Perfectly It can be so difficult to find envelopes that fit business checks perfectly. negative_passages.title: DuPont Tyvek StraightFlash Single-Sided - 4" x 150' - 1 Roll
negative_passages.text: Product Description DuPont StraightFlash for residential window flashing is ideal for protecting heads and jambs of rectangular windows. By bridging the interface between the rough opening and building envelope, DuPont StraightFlash protects these vulnerable areas that are subject to potential water damage. DuPont StraightFlash is a premium, self-adhered flashing made with DuPont Tyvek and a 100% butyl-based adhesive layer. This makes for a durable, premium window flashing that helps protect rain from entering around window openings in residential and commercial structures. StraightFlash flashing combines a DuPont Tyvek topsheet with a 100% butyl based adhesive layer. This allows it to combine the strength, durability, and water resistance of Tyvek material with the convenience and flexibility of a self-adhered flashing. When used as part of a DuPont Building Envelope system, DuPont StraightFlash door and window flashing can also help contribute towards U.S. Green Building Council LEED points. Qualified to several key industry-approved standards, including AAMA 711-07 Voluntary Specification for Self Adhering Flashing Used for Installation of Exterior Wall Fenestration Products.The result: premium door and window flashing protection that keeps rain out, and is designed to integrate with all other DuPont air and water barriers, as part of a building envelope system. negative_passages.title: Quality Park Reveal-N-Seal Business Security Envelope, 10, 4.125 x 9.5 Inches, White, 500 Envelopes (67218)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Product Description #10 (4 1/8 x 9 1/2") Reveal-N-Seal Business Security Envelopes. 500 count box. A unique and aggressive adhesive provides a strong, moisture-free secure seal that provides for 6x longer shelf life than normal self-seal envelopes. Security tinted with micro perfs along the flap for privacy of contents. No removable strip to throw away. From the Manufacturer Introducing the Ultimate self-sealing envelope, the Reveal-N-Seal ™! Envelopes that are a revolutionary re-invention of the business envelope, and are exclusively available from Quality Park Products. Reveal-N-Seal ™ envelopes are clean, safe, and easy—they provide a strong and moisture-free seal—just lift the flap and press to securely seal with no removable strip to throw away. Reveal-N-Seal™ self-sealing envelopes which require no moisture to seal and have no removable strip to throw away. These easy-to-seal/easy-to-open envelopes have additional built-in security features, a long shelf life, and the strongest adhesive available in a self-sealing envelope. Reveal-N-Seal™ envelopes are made with 24 lb. white wove paper (similar to most standard envelopes and to minimize your mailing costs by not unnecessarily relying on a more heavyweight paper), and feature double inside side-seams, Blue Park security tint, and an easy-to-use flip-seal design. Clean With Reveal-N-Seal Envelopes there is no need for messy water moisteners or glue sticks and there are no peel strips to create unwanted desk clutter or waste. Simply flip the flap open to expose the adhesive strip, and press to seal. Safe Security is further enhanced, by an inside printed blue Park Tint pattern and micro perfs along the flap that can reveal evidence of possible tampering. The aggressive and proprietary adhesive also has a 3-year shelf life, more than six times longer than a similar standard self-sealing envelope. Its security tint is the noted blue Quality Park tint- with small, crisp squares giving the envelope a refined look while better obscuring its contents. Also, the tint extends half-way up the inside of the upper flap for better coverage. Easy Reveal-N-Seal envelopes seal quickly and neatly in just two motions. Simply fold up the lower flap, revealing the patented adhesive, then fold down the top flap and press to form an aggressive, moisture-free seal. Clean, Safe, and Easy – Quality Park’s exclusive new Reveal-N-Seal ™ About Quality Park Products For more than 90 years, Quality Park Products has been the envelope manufacturing and converting leader, and the industry’s best source for imprinted products and services. We deliver opportunities to our customers in the office products, mailing, paper merchant, and shipping industries, which can build and grow their business by providing innovative products and unique visual communications solutions. negative_passages.text: Product Description Product Description Engineered for daily dependability, the X-ACTO Magnum Electric Pencil Sharpener in Black combines smart sharpening technology with rugged construction for high-volume office environments. Designed for heavy use, this reliable sharpener utilizes a hardened helical cutter to efficiently sharpen pencils to fine point tips. A heavy-duty electric motor delivers reliable sharpening power, while an Auto-Reset feature helps prevent overheating and damage. The X-ACTO Magnum Electric Pencil Sharpener is designed to serve large commercial environments. From the Manufacturer A member of the Elmer's family of brands, X-ACTO is the most recognized brand in cutting. X-ACTO is the #1 brand of pencil sharpener. X-ACTO electric pencil sharpeners are crafted from the highest quality materials, producing the reliability and performance you come to expect from X-ACTO. These electric sharpeners feature carbon steel sharpened blades and sturdy construction. So you get industry-leading durability--and a perfect point every time. The X-ACTO Magnum is strong, safe, and budget friendly. View larger If your busy office needs a sharpener that can go the distance, look no further than the X-ACTO Magnum Electric Pencil Sharpener. Don't be fooled by its classic styling: Underneath the X-ACTO Magnum's elegant exterior beats the heart of a heavy-duty motor designed for continuous use. Budget-Friendly You don't have all day to waste at the sharpener, watching your pencils ground down to unusable nibs. The Magnum's precision blades sharpen quickly and efficiently, which not only saves time but money. Finer sharpening translates into longer life for your pencils, an important consideration when it comes to more expensive, higher-grade implements. Your bottom line will thank you. Strong and Safe With its sturdy construction, the X-ACTO Magnum is built to take a beating from the toughest office environment. Knock it around and the Magnum will stay standing on its non-skid feet; neglect it and the Magnum's auto reset/shutoff feature prevents overheating. X-ACTO's unique SafeStart technology keeps the cutters from operating when the shaving receptacle is removed. Energy Efficient Save the environment while saving electricity, without constantly reminding yourself to plug and unplug your sharpener. The X-ACTO Magnum only draws energy when in use. negative_passages.title: Kutsuwa STAD Angle Adjustable Pencil Sharpener T'GAAL, Black (RS017BK)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Japanese KUTSUWA stad t'gaal is a compact portable Pencil sharper that can adjust sharpening angle and length in 5 different settings with a simple turn of a dial. For a sturdier tip, with less lead breakage, set the dial to a lower number such as 1 or 2. Shorter Pencil tip is recommended for softer lead such as color pencils or for short pencils such as golf pencils and half pencils. To obtain a longer lead tip, set the dial to a higher number. Longer lead point lasts longer before having to sharpen again and is suitable for harder lead pencils. With any angle the dial is set to, this angle adjustable manual Pencil sharpener produces a perfect sharp point every time. When not in use, set the dial to “close” so the shutter slides down and keeps the Pencil shavings from falling out of the hole. Contoured body fits comfortably in your hand and conveniently holds Pencil shavings before it needs dumping. These unique sharpeners are available in light Blue, Pink and Black. Made in Japan. negative_passages.text: Product Description This 12-count pack of USA Gold pencils from the Write Dudes includes 12 premium #2 wooden pencils that are easy to sharpen and have latex-free erasers. USA Gold pencils come in classic yellow and are made out of genuine American cedar. These pencils are excellent for work and school. USA Gold pencils come in classic yellow and are made out of genuine American cedar. These pencils are excellent for work and school. Key Features: 12 quality wooden pencils with latex-free erasers Classic yellow pencils with premium #2 HB lead Great for home, school or office Made in the USA from 100% Cedar woodFrom the manufacturer U.S.A. Gold – Pencils Proudly Made in Lewisburg, Tennessee since 1961 U.S.A. Gold is truly the gold standard in #2 HB pencils. With a 55 year history, these real wood pencils are domestically produced in Lewisburg, Tennessee out of sustained yield, California incense cedar wood making them premium, superior-quality pencils. Whether you purchase unsharpened or pre-sharpened, these PMA approved pencils sharpen easily and evenly in all types of sharpeners. Teachers prefer them because U.S.A. Gold Pencils will not ruin or jam up pencil sharpeners, making them the perfect school list and classroom staple. Additionally, the high quality graphite cores are bonded for superior point strength, smooth writing, and erase easily with the durable non-latex erasers. There’s no contest here. Go for the gold standard with U.S.A. Gold pencils, an excellent choice for school, home, or the office. Made in the USA 55 Year American Heritage Sharpen Evenly Won’t Jam Up Sharpeners Writes Smoothly Long-Lasting, Latex-Free Erasers Made from Sustained yield, Incense Cedar Wood No Rain Forest Wood used Made with Graphite, not lead PMA approved Classroom and Teacher approved! Read more People often wonder — how is America’s pencil made? Well, we are here to provide all the knitty-gritty details behind the making of USA Gold pencils. We start with high-quality, incense cedar wood harvested right here in the USA. Why cedar you ask? Cedar is widely recognized as the finest wood species available for manufacturing pencils. Its reddish-brown color, fine grain and low resin content allow us to manufacture pencils with a smooth surface that sharpen easily and evenly. You will find that most artist-quality colored and graphite pencils are made from Incense Cedar. Did we mention that the manufacturing magic happens at our factory right here in Lewisburg, Tennessee? Over the last 50+ years, we have earned the reputation of being the largest and finest pencil manufacturer in the USA and we are mighty proud of it! Here is the breakdown of how our pencils our made. It’s really quite an interesting 10 step process: 1. Incense Cedar logs are cut into pencil blocks. 2. Pencil blocks are cut into pencil slats. 3. Pencil slats are treated with wax and stain. 4. A machine cuts grooves into the slats to accept the writing core. 5. The writing core – made from a mixture of graphite and clay – is placed into the grooves. 6. A second grooved slat is glued on to the first, making a 'slat sandwich'. 7. The slat sandwich is machined into the pencil shape. 8. Individual pencils are cut from the sandwich and are sanded down for smoothness. 9. Each pencil is painted. Then, a recess is cut to accept the ferrule (the metal ring that holds the eraser to the pencil). 10. A ferrule and eraser are crimped into place on each pencil. That’s how America’s Favorite USA made #2 pencil is made! Read more

negative_passages.text: Product Description Built with today’s classroom in mind, this sharpener will help students sharpen their pencils quickly, quietly, and safely. And it’ll help teachers get back to teaching! The XHC cutter technology allows for 70% faster sharpening and 10x longer life. It is made with extra hardened steel and the blade is designed to be helical, allowing for a pointed tip every time in under 4 seconds. With the combination of a super duty motor and thermal overload protection, this electronic sharpener is completely protected from overheating. This means you can sharpen a lot of pencils without having to take a break in between. The operation is quiet with the durability to withstand strenuous classroom use. To ensure safety in the classroom, the tamper proof MagnaSafe shutoff technology smartly prevents operation when the shavings tray is removed. So, if the tray is removed, there’s no way to get the motor to run. This makes it the standard for safety in a classroom environment with young children around. The kid friendly, easy turn 6-size selector dial will accommodate the various pencil sizes used in schools. Whether your classroom is full of elementary school students using a jumbo pencil or a Ticonderoga Tri-Write; or older learners who use standard pencils, this electric pencil sharpener has got you covered! And for ease of use, the Tip Saver Technology prevents over sharpening, extending pencil life. Once a pencil is completely sharp, the blade cutters will pull back and no further sharpening can be done. This sharpener is the perfect addition to any classroom! positive_passages.text: Product Description Product Description DHA is an essential Omega-3 fatty acid and must be obtained from dietary sources or a high-quality supplement. Pregnancy and breastfeeding can place high demands on your body and deplete your DHA reserves. DHA is especially important in the last trimester of pregnancy and the first few months of an infant's life.† Oceans MOM® Prenatal DHA supplies 350mg of DHA, the optimum level for pregnant and lactating women, plus 15mg of EPA. One small, pleasant-tasting, Strawberry flavored softgel provides a broad range of benefits for both you and your baby.† It helps support brain, eyes and nervous system in developing babies, and enhances the quality of breast milk.† Oceans MOM utilizes a multiple-stage molecular distillation process, employing extensive quality controls to produce ultra pure, DHA rich fish oil. This product is verified pure and fresh through independent, third-party testing that exceeds strict international standards for peroxides, mercury, lead, dioxins and PCBs. Our fish oil is sustainably harvested and 5-Star certified by the International Fish Oil Standards (IFOS™) Program. For every bottle of Oceans MOM sold, a donation will be made to WomenHeart, an organization that champions prevention and early detection, accurate diagnosis and proper treatment of women's heart disease. †These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Poem copyright, Teri Harrison, The Grandparent Gift Co.From the brand Our story How we got our start When Teri Harrison’s mother became a grandma 30 years ago, Teri created a company to celebrate grandparents. The first product, the poem Grandma’s Heart, led to a collection of hundreds of unique gifts for the entire family. Teri continues to write and create gifts celebrating all of life’s moments What makes our product unique If we sell it, Teri created, wrote and designed the heartfelt messages paired with quality gifts. Teri is a pioneer of many gift categories — ultrasound ornaments, pet memorials and celebration of life gifts. We are a small family-owned US company based in Atlanta and put our hearts into what we do. Why we love what we do Knowing our gifts make it into thousands of people’s lives is humbling. It keeps us at our best every day. We are there with our fellow humans during life’s profound moments. We love to share in that and see it as a great privilege. It keeps us writing, creating, listening and loving what we do. From the manufacturer Mom Now That I'm a Mother Poem Frame: Giving Back the Love She Gave You The ultimate gift from the heart from daughter to mother on the birth of a first child. While holding her first child, poem author, Teri Harrison was moved by the realization that her mother loved her as fiercely and deeply as she loved her new baby boy. Growing up you know your Mom loves you, but at that moment, Teri truly understand the depth of that amazing love, something that needs to be lived to be understood. Whether a gift from daughter to mother on the birth of a first child, or for new Grandma's birthday, Mother's Day or any day you want to return the love, this beautiful sentiment frame will be treasured. There may not be a dry eye in the room when the gift is opened! The beautiful poem is printed on white paper and features a class, detailed embossed border and is framed in a silver tone 5x7 wood frame. The gift is perfect for a table, shelf or desk in Grandma's home or office and is proudly made in the USA. negative_passages.title: My Brest Friend Deluxe Nursing Pillow for Breastfeeding & Bottle Feeding, Enhanced Posture Support, Double Straps & Removable Extra Soft Slipcover, Flower Key Grey
negative_passages.text: Product Description Product Description Proper positioning makes all the difference when breastfeeding. New moms consult with lactation specialists only after becoming exasperated and exhausted, feeling they should instinctively know how to breastfeed or nurse their own baby, and not understand why they’re having trouble. This My Brest Friend breastfeeding essential pillow is designed to give moms the confidence they need to feel secure and position them for breastfeeding and nursing success. My Brest Friend is here to help alleviate some of these stresses and demystify what many new caregivers experience during those first precious months of your newborn baby’s life. Enjoy The Support You’ve Been Looking For Discover the solution in the Deluxe Nursing Pillow. After years of thorough research and real-life testing, it is specifically designed to make breastfeeding more comfortable. Its supportive backrest encourages good posture during breastfeeding and prevents neck and shoulder strain, too. Also great at minimizing strain at the elbows and wrists to encourage baby bonding. Innovative Shape Keeps Baby Close My Brest Friend boasts a unique shape and is the only pillow that fits snuggly against the wearer, eliminating the gap that most crescent-shaped and U-shaped nursing pillows have. This is especially important to facilitate proper latching for consistent feedings. From the Manufacturer The My Brest Friend nursing pillow is the perfect support pillow for proper latch-on and breastfeeding in comfort and security. The nursing pillow was developed in a laboratory of new moms, babies, and breastfeeding experts who set out to create a nursing pillow whose sole purpose was to answer all the needs of breastfeeding moms and babies. In addition to providing the best nursing pillow on the market, My Brest Friend also provides mom with additional accessories to make pregnancy and breastfeeding easier and more successful. These accessories include a 3-in-1 Body Pillow, Pregnancy Wedge, Nursing Stool, XL Burp Cloths, Privacy Nursing Covers, Nipple Cream, Fenugreek (for increased milk supply) and Breastfeeding Essentials Multivitamins all conveniently found on Amazon. negative_passages.title: My Brest Friend Original Nursing Pillow for Breastfeeding, Nursing and Posture Support with Pocket and Removable Slipcover, Sunshine Poppy
negative_passages.text: Product Description Product Description Proper positioning makes all the difference when breastfeeding. New moms consult with lactation specialists only after becoming exasperated and exhausted, feeling they should instinctively know how to breastfeed or nurse their own baby, and not understand why they’re having trouble. This My Brest Friend breastfeeding essential pillow is designed to give moms the confidence they need to feel secure and position them for breastfeeding and nursing success. My Brest Friend is here to help alleviate some of these stresses and demystify what many new caregivers experience during those first precious months of your newborn baby’s life. Enjoy The Support You’ve Been Looking For Discover the solution in the Original Nursing Pillow. After years of thorough research and real-life testing, it is specifically designed to make breastfeeding more comfortable. Its supportive backrest encourages good posture during breastfeeding and prevents neck and shoulder strain, too. Also great at minimizing strain at the elbows and wrists to encourage baby bonding. Innovative Shape Keeps Baby Close My Brest Friend boasts a unique shape and is the only pillow that fits snuggly against the wearer, eliminating the gap that most crescent-shaped and U-shaped nursing pillows have. This is especially important to facilitate proper latching for consistent feedings. Keep baby safe and sound and held securely in place on our firm and flat pillow throughout the entire nursing session. Designed Just For You Keep all your maternity supplies and accessories easily within reach in the super-convenient side pocket. Store extra bottles, nipple cream or even store anything else you might need to avoid getting up in the middle of nursing and disrupting baby. Wrap around design provides welcome support to your weary back and sore shoulders. My Brest Friend Original Nursing Pillow surrounds your body for the ideal position and comfort for baby. Clever silent-release straps lets you slip away quietly when your newborn nods off and unlatches without waking the babe. My Brest Friend strives to provide new mothers with the most intuitive and useful maternity products on the market. We are proud to be among the most preferred brands for lactation consultants and mothers alike and keep the comfort of mother and child at the forefront of everything we create. Popular Positions for Nursing Football: Mom puts her arm under her baby and supports them using her palm on their back and to support their head. Lay them down on a pillow next to you with their head at the end pointing down toward your feet, then put your arm underneath them and bring them up to your breast with their nose in line with the nipple, holding them similar to the way you would a football. Cradle: Your baby will be on its back horizontally and resting comfortably. If you’re feeding from the left breast, its head will rest in the crook of that same arm. The rest of your arm will be under the baby’s back and you’ll need to make sure that its spine, neck and head are fully supported while its nose is in line with the nipple from which they are feeding. Relax & Snuggle: Mom can lay on her side propped up with pillows behind her and the baby is laid on their side next to her at her breast, using the breastfeeding pillow to keep them in place. Bring your arm over your head to cradle your baby’s head and make sure it is properly placed at your breast as they feed. From the Manufacturer The My Brest Friend breastfeeding essential nursing pillow is the perfect support pillow for proper latch-on and breastfeeding in comfort and security. The nursing pillow was developed in a laboratory of new moms, babies, and breastfeeding experts who set out to create a nursing pillow whose sole purpose was to answer all the needs of breastfeeding moms and babies. From the Manufacturer The My Brest Friend nursing pillow is the perfect support pillow for proper latch-on and breastfeeding in comfort and security. From the Manufacturer The My Brest Friend breastfeeding essential nursing pillow is the perfect support pillow for proper latch-on and breastfeeding in comfort and security. The nursing pillow was developed in a laboratory of new moms, babies, and breastfeeding experts who set out to create a nursing pillow whose sole purpose was to answer all the needs of breastfeeding moms and babies. From the Manufacturer The My Brest Friend nursing pillow is the perfect support pillow for proper latch-on and breastfeeding in comfort and security. The nursing pillow was developed in a laboratory of new moms, babies, and breastfeeding experts who set out to create a nursing pillow whose sole purpose was to answer all the needs of breastfeeding moms and babies.From the manufacturer About Us: MY BREST FRIEND MISSION STATEMENT To facilitate healthy bonding and help create a physical, emotional, and psychological connection between mom and baby. THE MY BREST FRIEND JOURNEY… Before My Brest Friend, when a mom wanted to breastfeed, she usually looked around for something nearby to help prop up baby into position. Her only options included: bed pillows rolled-up towels a sofa cushion a toddler u-shaped pillow Unfortunately, none of these household items could stay in place for very long, would cause Mom to shift and end the session early, or force Mom to stay frozen in place – resulting in muscle fatigue, back pain, discomfort, and soreness. Without support, as nursing moms can often breastfeed up to 15 times a day, this can cause serious frustration and stress for both mom and baby. This can even result in less breastfeeding, or for moms to give up nursing entirely due to difficulties with positioning or latch-on, before they have a successful experience. This can be devastating for mom, especially new mothers, and their sense of self. This can also mean that baby misses out on many important psychological and health benefits that come from bonding with Mom through breastfeeding. Both Mom and baby deserve the chance to enjoy all of the benefits of breastfeeding comfortably, and at ease. Back Support Helps you maintain good posture during feeding which prevents soreness in your back and neck. Convenient Pocket Keep your accessories and nursing supplies in easy reach with My Brest Friend's attached pocket. Wrap Around Design My Brest Friend secures to your body. This helps you and your baby maintain ideal positioning for latch-on and prevents your baby from rolling in the gap that other nursing pillows create. Arm & Elbow Support Eliminates shoulder and arm stress caused from breastfeeding without My Brest Friend pillow. Read more Slipcovers Click-n-Buy Travel Nursing Pillow Click-n-Buy Super Deluxe Nursing Pillow Click-n-Buy Nursing Stool Click-n-Buy Inner Core Cover Click-N-Buy My Brest Friend Essential Breastfeeding and Pregnancy Support Many moms enjoy buying extra breastfeeding pillow slipcovers so that when spit up or leaky diapers strike, they can toss the original slipcover into the washer, and replace it with a clean, fresh cover without missing a beat. My Brest Friend travel pillow has same patented design as Original My Brest Friend pillow. It can be packed flat to fit in a diaper bag or purse. Ideal for airplanes or overnight travel. Quick and easy to inflate and deflate as needed. Includes more lumbar support, increased height and thickness in front cushion to more easily comfort baby and lift baby closer to the breast, right/left side tracker, and water proof inner cover to protect the pillow's core. My Brest Friend's nursing stool can help a breastfeeding mother minimize lower back, shoulder, neck, and wrist pain by helping her to maintain a supportive, comfortable position throughout the feed. Accidents happen, and although the My Brest Friend nursing pillow comes with a slipcover, it pays to have extra coverage. This waterproof inner cover protects the core foam pillow from spit up or leaky diapers decreasing need for spot cleaning.

negative_passages.title: 【Lifetime Warranty】4th Generation Doctor Mom LED Pocket Pro Otoscope with both Adult and Pediatric Disposable Specula Tips, Battery, and Protective Hard Plastic Case
negative_passages.text: Product Description Engineered and Built to be Reliable for Life! Highest rated Otoscope model sold on Amazon; More IMPORTANTLY we do not cheat; We have never used Incentivized Reviews (free product for a review) and we NEVER will because it creates an uneven playing field. Excellent Function, Always Reliable, backed by us FOREVER!! Doctor Mom Otoscope Doctor Mom was founded by an ER physician and a pediatrician and has been helping parents for over 25 years. Our goal was to offer a high-quality otoscope that was affordable by all — before us, the only otoscopes available were expensive professional models. The First Home-Use Otoscope - Designed and built with two purposes in mind Function and Reliability; The only 2 things that matter when it comes to an otoscope! Doctor Mom created the first LED otoscope and has been helping parents lead a healthy home since 1996. Our otoscopes were designed by an ER Physician and a Pediatrician. Our goal was to offer a high quality otoscope that was highly accurate and reliable. The Doctor Mom Otoscope can be used to help diagnose a variety of conditions. Using a 4x magnified optical lens, it shines a beam of light into the ear, helping parents to: Examine child's eardrum or ear canal Better see the outer and inner middle portions of the ear Help diagnose earaches or ear infections, ear wax buildup and other conditions Our company has been around for over 25 years and we will be around if you have any issues or problems in the future. We are a small Wyoming based company that truly cares about our customers. If your not happy then we are not happy! Read more Based in Wyoming, USA, Doctor Mom Otoscope is the first company to offer at-home otoscopes and has been helping parents since 1996. By choosing Doctor Mom, you can trust you're using a quality at-home product with your children from a trusted American-made company. ** Backed by us FOREVER, but please remove batteries when storing for extended periods since leaking corroded batteries are not covered** Doctor Mom Otoscopes built the very first LED otoscope. We use a proprietary soft white color LED module that protects against voltage spikes— not the bluish white simple LED bulbs like others. There is no need ever for replacement bulbs! Just add batteries, which are included with your purchase! Doctor Mom's 4th Generation Otoscope has a large diameter spherical optical quality scratch-resistant lens, and comes in a protective case. You will also receive a weblink showing images of normal and infected ears, plus otoscope use instructions written by an experienced ER physician. Doctor Mom began the at-home otoscopy movement in 1996. Our professional otoscopes are backed by us, so you can be confident in your purchase no matter how long you have owned it. ** Backed by us FOREVER, but please remove batteries when storing for extended periods since leaking corroded batteries are not covered** Read more Never Replace the Bulb! The Doctor Mom difference: Our LED is built on a circuit board with a DC to DC Boost Converter, which allows for voltage regulation. negative_passages.text: Product Description Product Description Proper positioning makes all the difference when breastfeeding. New moms consult with lactation specialists only after becoming exasperated and exhausted, feeling they should instinctively know how to breastfeed or nurse their own baby, and not understand why they’re having trouble. This My Brest Friend breastfeeding essential pillow is designed to give moms the confidence they need to feel secure and position them for breastfeeding and nursing success. My Brest Friend is here to help alleviate some of these stresses and demystify what many new caregivers experience during those first precious months of your newborn baby’s life. Enjoy The Support You’ve Been Looking For Discover the solution in the Deluxe Nursing Pillow. After years of thorough research and real-life testing, it is specifically designed to make breastfeeding more comfortable. Its supportive backrest encourages good posture during breastfeeding and prevents neck and shoulder strain, too. Also great at minimizing strain at the elbows and wrists to encourage baby bonding. Innovative Shape Keeps Baby Close My Brest Friend boasts a unique shape and is the only pillow that fits snuggly against the wearer, eliminating the gap that most crescent-shaped and U-shaped nursing pillows have. This is especially important to facilitate proper latching for consistent feedings. From the Manufacturer The My Brest Friend nursing pillow is the perfect support pillow for proper latch-on and breastfeeding in comfort and security. The nursing pillow was developed in a laboratory of new moms, babies, and breastfeeding experts who set out to create a nursing pillow whose sole purpose was to answer all the needs of breastfeeding moms and babies. In addition to providing the best nursing pillow on the market, My Brest Friend also provides mom with additional accessories to make pregnancy and breastfeeding easier and more successful. These accessories include a 3-in-1 Body Pillow, Pregnancy Wedge, Nursing Stool, XL Burp Cloths, Privacy Nursing Covers, Nipple Cream, Fenugreek (for increased milk supply) and Breastfeeding Essentials Multivitamins all conveniently found on Amazon. By choosing Doctor Mom, you can trust you're using a quality at-home product with your children from a trusted American-made company. The Doctor Mom Difference Doctor Mom Otoscopes built the very first LED otoscope even before W/A. We have designed and built all our products as they say" From The Ground Up" Our company was created by an ER physician and a pediatrician in Texas. One physician was a design engineer and the other an inventor, before they were physicians. Our otoscopes are engineered and built to last forever. ** Backed by us FOREVER, but please remove batteries when storing for extended periods since leaking corroded batteries are not covered** Batteries Included Doctor Mom's 5th Generation Otoscope has our largest optical quality scratch-resistant lens, and comes in a protective case. You will also receive a weblink showing images of normal and infected ears, plus otoscope use instructions written by an experienced ER physician. We use a proprietary soft white LED module — not the bluish white LED bulbs like others. There is no need ever for replacement bulbs! Just add batteries, which are included with your purchase! Helping Parents for Over 25 Years Doctor Mom began the at-home otoscopy movement in 1996. Our professional otoscopes are backed by us forever to the original purchaser, so you can be confident in your purchase. INCENTIVIZED REVIEWS; we never use them, and never will.... Take time to read reviews to understand how getting free product for doing a review can artificially inflate a product. As long as you can remove bad reviews off the most recent review page in a day with incentivized reviews, no one gets an accurate assessment of how your product really performs. Read more Never Replace the Bulb! The Doctor Mom difference is that our LED is built on a circuit board with a capacitor and resistor, allowing for voltage regulation. This protects against voltage spikes that are often seen with new batteries. This voltage regulation protects the LED bulb from failure. Other otoscopes that use a simple LED bulb not built on a circuit board have a limited life span due to voltage spikes that are inherent with almost all new batteries. There is a reason otoscopes that use a simple LED bulb (with no way to regulate against voltage spikes) often come with a replacement LED bulb knowing the life is limited. Over time the cost of replacment bulbs will make the cost of otoscope ownership much greater than Doctor Mom. ** Backed by us FOREVER, but please remove batteries when storing for extended periods since leaking corroded batteries are not covered** Diagnose Ear Infections Easily Get everything you need to diagnose ear infections! The Doctor Mom Otoscope comes complete with batteries, adult and pediatric specula, and a protective case. We include images of normal and infected ear drums on the otoscope case, which is very helpful when initially learning to use your otoscope. We also include a weblink that takes you to 30 high resolution images as well as otoscope use instructions written by an experienced ER physician. Full-Size Diameter Optical Quality Lens Our largest diameter lens with 4x magnification and an optimal focal length. It is a full-size otoscope, as large as a professional model Welch Allyn! The lens is scratch-resistant, and our otoscope comes complete with a protective hard case that helps to make this a tool one that will last you a lifetime! Built to Last Forever! Durable but lightweight handle made from a thick aluminum and not plastic, Heavy-duty push-button switch that is built to last and our otoscope is backed by us forever. **(battery issues are not included, so please remove batteries when storing for extended periods, since leaking corroded batteries are not covered)** Read more The Highest Rated most Economical Replacement Specula on Amazon in packs of 120; You will also NEVER need a bulb replacement with our LED module Understand the complete picture on cost of ownership; Doctor Mom has the highest rated yet least expensive adult and pediatric size otoscope specula sold on Amazon in packs of 120 for less than twelve dollars (others charge 14 dollars for 50 specula and theirs are not interchangeable with standard W/A specula like ours). Specula are needed to keep your otoscope sanitary, allowing it to be used from one person to the next without risking the transfer of an external or fungal ear infection between two people. When you combine the fact that you will never have to purchase another LED module vs otoscopes that use simple LED bulbs that do burn out, there is no lower cost otoscope you can own over time. New sets of batteries often come with voltage surges which cause unprotected simple LED bulbs to burn out. There is a reason the otoscopes that use simple bulbs often come with 2 or more spare bulbs when you purchase them. Doctor Mom will still be with you when you are ready to hand the otoscope over to your children to use with your grandchildren in 25 years. Then again, as you get older, and your hearing begins to wane, you may want to check and see if it is nothing more than an earwax buildup causing you not to hear so well. One thing for sure we will be here in 25 years like we have been over the past 25. Reliability DfR - Long term reliability means EVERYTHING When you need an otoscope you REALLY need it! Engineers often talk about the importance of Design for Reliability (DfR) and the impact it has on a product’s overall efficiencies and success. Luckily, one of the two physicians involved in creating the Dr Mom Otoscope was a design engineer before he was a physician and understood the importance of reliability, especially for an instrument like a home use otoscope. This is a tool that will spend the majority of its life in a drawer or medicine cabinet, but when you need it, you need it to work. The emotional and physical changes a new mother goes through during labor and pregnancy are unlike anything else. In the weeks and months that follow, new mothers are dealing with the physical and emotional consequences of holding and delivering a child, not to mention all that is involved in caring for a child. The result is often that new mothers spend every bit of energy on caring for their babies, sometimes even forgetting that self-care is also extremely important. Self-care not only lifts the mood and spirits of a person, but it can increase confidence as well. Read more

positive_passages.title: Foot Peel Mask 3 Pack， Exfoliator Peel Off Calluses Dead Skin Callus Remover，Baby Soft Smooth Touch Feet-Men Women (Lavender)
positive_passages.text: Product Description Do You Have Calluses, Dry Cracked Heels, or Hard Skin? Foot Peel Mask was designed to remove the dead skin on your feet that build up over time and can improve kinds of problems associated with the soles of your feet. and remove dry dead skin and repair course cracked heels. Package Included: 3Pack Foot Peeling Mask Directions For Use: 1. Clean your feet and dry it. 2. Take out the foot mask and cut along the dotted line as indicated. Put your foot into the mask and attach adhesive tape to secure the foot . 3. Wear the mask for about 50-90 minutes to allow the ingredients to become absorbed into the skin. 4. Take off the mask and wash your feet with soap . 5. The dead skin cells will begin to peel 5-7 days after the initial application. Do not forcibly remove the dead skin from your feet, let them peel naturally. Tips To Remember: ★A sensibility test is highly recommended if you have sensitive skin due to the exfoliating nature of the mask. Get some liquid from the mask and put it on your ankle or on the top of your feet. Wait for 10 minutes to see how it works. ★After using, soak your feet in warm water for about 20 minutes in the following a few days to get better results. ★Individual results will vary. ★Use immediately after opening. IMPORTANT TIPS: 1.For external use only . 2.Do not use this product, if you are pregnant or nursing. 3.Do not apply to damaged, irritated or damaged skin. 4.Patch test required if first use of this product 5.If skin irritation,stop use. positive_passages.title: Dylonic Exfoliating Silicone Body Scrubber - Razor Bump Brush + Ingrown Hair Treatment Exfoliator Loofah | Eliminate Shaving Irritation for Legs, Armpit, Bikini Line | Smooth Skin Solution Men + Women
positive_passages.text: From the brand Previous page How did we get our start? Dylonic began with a small team of dreamers obsessed with skincare. We believe in creating long-term, affordable, easy to use, chemical-free skincare solutions. What makes our products unique? Our products stop ingrown hairs and razor bumps in their tracks. They're affordable, chemical-free, and make excellent exfoliators. Designed for easy use, no matter where you need ingrown hair relief. Why do we love what we do? Dylonic frees you from worrying about unsightly red bumps and painful ingrown hairs. We can’t wait for you to feel more confident & comfortable in your skin. Next page Product Description Imagine beautiful, bump-free skin. With Dylonic, it’s Just a Brush Away! Are you tired of waking up every morning worrying about ingrown hairs and razor bumps? Brush that fear away with Dylonic! Our bristle brush is the chemical-free, simple to use, all-natural way to treat and prevent razor bumps and ingrown hairs. You can use it on wet or dry skin all over the body, including but not limited to the legs, armpits, neck, beard, bikini line, and more. This amazing tool puts YOU in charge of your skin care! Revamp your personal care routine for skin so Smooth and Clean! Shaving, waxing, and a whole host of other methods — no one can escape hair removal. But if the point of hair removal is sensationally smooth skin, how come no one ever talks about those irritating, embarrassing bumps that can pop up in the place of unwanted hair? At Dylonic, we weren’t afraid to talk about razor bumps – in fact, we developed the solution to fending them off for good. The key is in an effective exfoliant and daily exfoliation routine that keeps hair follicles from clogging or snagging. Dylonic’s flexible bristles will stimulate the skin anywhere you remove hair, expertly reversing razor bumps and ingrown hairs, as well as preventing them in the future! Read more How It Works - Ingrown Hairs Ingrown hairs occur when a hair follicle becomes clogged with dead skin cells. If those particles - also known as the "dead layer" - aren’t removed, they trap hairs under the epidermis. The result is an ingrown hair that’s painful and inflamed. Exfoliate with Dylonic to see and feel the bump-free difference as dead skin cells are massaged away, follicles clear, and tricky ingrown hairs dislodge, revealing healthy, radiant skin! Read more How It Works - Razor Bumps Razor bumps appear when the hair is cut off where it exits the skin, curls back and starts growing inwards. The body recognizes this hair as a foreign object and triggers an inflammatory response that includes redness, itchiness and a raised area. It looks a bit like a pimple - thus the “bumps” in razor bumps. The Dylonic’s flexible bristles lift the stubborn hair out of the skin. Once the hair is lifted, it can be easily shaved off, leaving behind nothing but a smooth, bump-free skin. Read more How To Use Light & Gentle Dylonic combines customized comfort and exfoliating effectiveness with bristles that are both firm and flexible. Always start with a very light pressure, moving your brush in straight lines against the hair’s grain. Wet & Dry For best results, use BEFORE shaving or waxing on wet or dry skin. If the dry method feels too abrasive, use it in shower, with a light lotion or shower gel for smoother, gentler results. Whichever method you choose, adjust the routine based on your skin’s needs and sensitivity. Twice Daily Brush with Dylonic once in the morning and once at night for 15-30 seconds each. With regular, twice daily use you’ll be enjoying noticeable results in no time! Easy to Clean Easily disassemble your Dylonic to clean and dry it by gently inserting a thin object, in the joint between the handle and bristles. We recommend replacing the brush every six months for maximum hygiene. Read more

positive_passages.title: Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub, Removes Poisonous Plant Oils That Cause Rash and Itching, 4 Ounces
positive_passages.text: Product Description Don’t let poison oak or ivy ruin your outdoor plans! Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub is the first step in your poison oak or ivy treatment regimen. Use before or after the rash has appeared. Our special skin cleanser works by washing away urushiol, the toxic resin found in poisonous plants, allowing the skin to begin its natural healing process. Tecnu Extreme is an excellent first choice before a cortisone or hydrocortisone treatment. If the rash has already begun, we recommend using Tecnu Extreme as an all-over body application. Apply product to wet skin. Then gently scrub the affected areas to remove the rash-causing poison ivy oil from your skin. Complete your treatment regimen by following up with an anti-itch and pain relieving gel or spray. Be proactive next time. Tecnu Extreme can also be used before a rash begins. After coming in contact with poisonous plants, apply Tecnu Extreme to exposed areas of skin. If you’re hypersensitive, do an all- over application, since the rash-causing oils are invisible and can spread to other parts of the body. Tecnu products are designed for those who love the outdoors, adventure and exploring. Our product collection includes the Tecnu Original Outdoor Cleanser, Tecnu Extreme Poison Ivy and Oak Scrub, Tecnu Rash Relief Spray and Calagel Anti-Itch Gel. Tecnu products allow you to wander confidently, knowing you have powerful protection and fast-acting itch relief at your fingertips. Tecnu Extreme does not contain plastic microbeads. The exfoliating ingredient in Tecnu Extreme is silicon dioxide (SiO2), also known as silica. It is a natural compound made of two of the earth’s most abundant materials: silicon (Si) and oxygen (O2). Silicon dioxide is most often recognized in the form of quartz, and It’s found naturally in water, plants, animals, and the earth. positive_passages.title: TubShroom Tub Hair Catcher Drain Protector, Fits 1.5"-1.75", Gray
positive_passages.text: Product Description Product Description We face a myriad of challenges each and every day. Cleaning clogged drains, thankfully, no longer has to be one of them-thanks to the TubShroom. TubShroom fits snug inside your shower tub drain, all Calm and collected, effortlessly gathering each and every hair that tries to make its way down your vulnerable drain. It's the hero you deserve in your bathroom. TubShroom works great with both human and pet hair. Love bathing your pets in the tub but Hate having to deal with the clean uptubshroom has got you covered. Instead of going through the hassle and cost of Hiring a Plumber to repair your clogged drains, consider our more elegant solution. Even chemical drain cleaners often times don't work the way they're supposed to and can be harmful to your pipes. TubShroom was made as a more cost effective, environmentally friendly alternative to this common problem. TubShroom was designed to be easy to clean and practically maintenance free. The high grade material can last the test of time. It collects weeks worth of hair before you have to clean off the neatly gathered hair with a simple swipe of a paper towel. As a bonus, TubShroom even fits in the second most popular size of bathroom sink drains (1.5") on the market today. TubShroom is available in six fun colors: clean white, marine blue, organic green, titan clear, neutral gray, and autumn orange. Try one today. From the Manufacturer Smarter Drain Protection TubShroom fits any standard shower bathtub drain with a snug fit. The unique mushroom-like shape allows for maximum water flow so you can keep on showering. Hair collects neatly inside the drain around the bottom lip--completely out of sight--until you're ready to clean it off. A drain that has TubShroom in place can go weeks without having to be cleaned. The Last Hair Catcher You'll Ever Need Your TubShroom was built with long-lasting, industrial-strength silicone so it doesn't need to be replaced for at least 10 years. Say good-bye to harmful cleaners, pricey plumbers, and clogged drains forever. Get back to enjoying your showers in peace. Simple Installation TubShroom is so easy to use that all you really need to do is place it inside your shower tub drain. If your drain has a cover, it can usually be removed with a screwdriver in seconds. You can check the unit every other week to see how much hair has gathered. Easy to Clean When it's time to clean your TubShroom, simply lift it out of the drain with one hand and clean off the gathered hair with a paper towel. You'll notice the hair comes off in one swipe, neatly and cleanly. Hair has never been so cooperative A Better Hair Trap For such a small product, the benefits are numerous. If you've tried other drain protectors or hair strainers already, you know how much room there is for improvement in this space. TubShroom gets it right every time. See for yourself. Making Showers Fun Again Long hair? Short hair? Thick hair? Curly hair? Dog hair? Cat hair? No longer a problem! Go on lovin' your beautiful hair, we say. We want the TubShroom to be one of the best investments you can make in your home. About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words. Incredible Drain Protection How did you come up with the idea for this product? My wife and I both have long hair. And we have several pets in the house. Just try to imagine the number of times our drain has clogged over the years from all that hair and the amount of time and money we had to spend to keep it clear. There had to be a better way. It took years of brainstorming to come up with, what we think, is the perfect solution. What makes your product special? First and foremost… it works great. If it solved the problem of clogged drains for us and for our friends, we're certain it will do the same for you. It's made of durable, high-quality silicone that should last as long as your bathroom does. No cheap plastics that can crack and bend over time. We took the idea to the crowdfunding world and the response was overwhelming. We're proud of this little product because we feel it's a clever solution to a real problem out there. The only downside is that plumbers and drain cleaner manufacturers may not like us very much after this. What has been the best part of your startup experience? The best part was seeing the product come to life, so to speak. It's our baby now and every person that it helps along the way will bring a big old smile to our faces. The positive feedback from early supporters and early testers has motivated us to get TubShroom in as many drains as possible. positive_passages.title: Lysol Laundry Sanitizer Additive, Bacteria-Causing Laundry Odor Eliminator, 0% Bleach Laundry Sanitizer, color, , Multi 90 Fl Oz Crisp Linen
positive_passages.text: Product Description Our clothes are in constant contact with bacteria throughout our day-to-day activities, for example through contact with contaminated surfaces, other people and our own bodies. Bacteria can spread from one fabric to another in the laundry basket, from the washing-machine drum to the next load. Some these bacteria can survive a wash cycle and can cause potential infection risk with pathogenic bacteria. When it comes to certain laundry loads such as children's clothes or sportswear, you want your detergent to eliminate bacteria that can cause illnesses and create lingering bad smells. But detergents alone don't actually kill all bacteria. Introducing Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, an additive specially designed to kill 99.9% of bacteria left behind. Simply add Lysol Laundry Sanitizer to your rinse cycle. It does not contain any bleach and even works in cold water so is safe to use on most fabrics including whites, colors and darks. negative_passages.title: RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint (Cream)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Before you invest a lot of time and money to reglaze or replace a worn, washed-up tub, or have it covered over with an expensive bath-fitting liner, try RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint. For a fraction of the cost of remodeling, you can give a tired-looking tub or shower stall a like-new look for your own use, or to improve resale appeal. It creates a durable, low-sheen finish that not only looks great, it's washable and easy to maintain. This easy-to-use, one-part refinishing paint is more than just an affordable alternative for the price-conscious homeowner looking to touch up or resurface their tub. Its fast-drying formula lets you finish the job in a fraction of the time, making this an easy project to finish in a few hours. Just stir well and use a brush or roller to apply to properly prepared acrylic, fiberglass, or enamel surfaces. Apply 2-3 coats in a single day—waiting just 1 hour between coats—and your tub or shower will be ready to use in just 24 hours. RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint is a water-based coating, so it has no noxious fumes, which makes it great for indoor use. It's also very easy to clean up with just soap & water. To keep you safe from slips and falls, apply a couple coats of RTG Shower & Tub Non-Slip Paint to the floor. It contains a non-skid additive that's not gritty or abrasive, so it's comfortable against the skin. Best of all, it comes in a color to match the refinishing paint. The bathtub and shower are focal points of any bathroom. Compare to Rustoleum Tub & Tile Refinishing Paint and AquaFinish Bathtub and Tile Refinishing Kit. RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint features an appealing satin sheen, great coverage, & easy maintenance. Important surface prep instructions: Do not use on ceramic, porcelain, or tile. All surfaces must be clean, dry and free of grease, dirt, and oils. Carefully mask off and sand with 220 grit sandpaper. Remove residue and wipe clean with lint-free rag and denatured alcohol. APPLICATION: Thoroughly stir or shake RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint before applying.Apply between 50-90°F. RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint can be applied easily by brush or roller. Use nylon bristle brushes, or 1/8" to 3/16" nap or foam rollers. Apply 2-3 coats of RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint, waiting 1-2 hours between coats.Do not wait more than 12 hours between coates. If more than 12 hours elapses between coats, the surface must be scuffed with a Scoth-Brite pad or 320-grit sandpaper, then wiped clean with a clean, lint-free cotton rag dampened with water.Allow surfaces to dry completely before painting. Allow RTG & Tub Refinishing Paint to dry for atleast 24 hours before use. negative_passages.title: Pre de Provence No.63 Men's Collection, Lotion
negative_passages.text: Product Description No. 63 Is THE Fragrance for Men Our No. 63 Collection is the expression of masculine fragrance with a warm and spicy scent that can be described as peppery with a mild citrus note, rounded out by cedar wood, juicy plum, and violet leaves that finish into an ambery base of leather and tobacco. A wonderful, everyday scent that will travel to the office and then to a night out with good company, turning heads while you walk through the crowd. Our collection includes a triple-milled shave soap, lotion, beard oil, shave cream, shower gel, cologne, bath soap, after shave, and hand cream. Discover these amazing products for yourself and man-up in the bathroom. The Inspiration It always starts with a road trip. After hours of flying, we head out from Marseille onto a faceless highway that could be found anywhere in the world. Finally, we feel the road begin to gently bend and wind around wooded hillsides, woven among open farmlands as we climb the mountainous plateaus and valleys. Bright sun and blue skies rejuvenate us. Fresh air of warm woody, herbaceous scents invigorates us. Where will the next curve take us on our adventure 63 miles north into the heart of Provence? Welcome to No.63. No. 63 Men's After Shave Balm Use our Pré de Provence after shave balm to help soothe skin irritation caused by shaving, soaps and detergents. Nature casts a magical spell on this haven in southern France, nestled between sky-reaching mountains and the Mediterranean Sea. The skies shine blue, endless mineral-rich waters sparkle, and verdant meadows abound with fragrant treasures of lavender, wildflowers, herbs, fruits and vegetables. Just breathing the wonderful scents in the air brings peace and tranquility. It is these fragrances we infuse into our products so that you may experience this Magic of Provence. Indulge yourself in a full range of skin-nourishing bath and body products created using the purest vegetable ingredients, rich shea butter, organic argan oil, or even sun-cured sea salt. We believe that experiencing natural beauty should be an everyday, affordable luxury. And every product should be as authentically French as Pré de Provence.

negative_passages.title: Panasonic Electric Shaver for Women, Cordless 3 Blade Razor, Pop-Up Trimmer, Close Curves, Wet Dry Operation, Independent Floating Heads - ES2207P
negative_passages.text: Product Description With the cordless ES2207P Panasonic Close Curves Electric Razor for Women you can shave closely and comfortably with wet/dry convenience. Quiet, fully immersible and 100% washable, this ladies electric shaver is safe for use anytime on dry skin, or in the bath or shower at your leisure with lather from gel, foam or soap. Either way, you'll always enjoy, close, convenient shaving and trimming with this wet/dry shaver. The Panasonic ES2207P women’s electric shaver's three independently floating heads and hypo-allergenic stainless-steel blades and foil are especially gentle on sensitive skin, and designed to glide naturally along the body's individual contours for smooth results on legs, underarms and bikini lines. And for the perfect finish, a handy pop-up trimmer works as a bikini trimmer to quickly trim and maintains the bikini area, while also removing unwanted long or stray hairs anywhere you find them. This sleek, ergonomic women’s electric razor fits naturally in either hand for total shaving and trimming control. Cleaning the Panasonic Close Curves wet/dry shaver is quick and simple. Just rinse the lady shaver/trimmer under running water to remove stubborn gel, soap and stubble, leaving the blades and foil fresh and renewed. And for shaving and trimming away from home, the Panasonic ES2207P ladies electric razor comes with a compact AC charger and a travel pouch.
