Permanent & Demi- Permanent Toners Semi- Permanent Creative Colors Lighteners Developers Wella colorcharm Lightener Dust-free Powder Lightener Use Wella colorcharm Dust-Free Powder Lightener for brilliant blonde results with up to 7 levels of lift. With its controlled and reliable lightening action, the Powder Lightener is ideal for all on- and off-scalp application techniques. It has a protecting oil system to help lock in moisture. Read more What to Prepare Wella colorcharm Lightener and Toner T18 , bowl & brush, gloves, towel, old t-shirt , protective barrier cream (like coconut oil) and a timer. Step 1 - Lightening & Root Touch-up For Root touch-up: 1. Mix 1 part Wella colorcharm lightener with 2 parts 20 volume developer. 2. Apply to the new growth making sure not to overlap with previously lightened hair. 3. Process for 30 minutes or until the roots have reached a light yellow. 4. Mix 1 part Wella colorcharm lightener with 2 parts 10 volume developer and apply to the mid length and ends. 5. Process an additional 20 minutes until hair is pale yellow. Rinse and shampoo. F or first time lightening: 1 . Divide the hair into four sections, securing with a clip. 2. Start applying on the back section, 1 /2" away from the scalp, taking 1/4" partings to ensure proper saturation and apply on all 4 sections. P rocess for 20 minutes. 3 . Finally, apply on the roots and process until achieving a light pale blonde. Shampoo & condition. Step 2 - Tone 1. Mix 1 part Wella colorcharm toner T18 with 2 parts 20 volume developer . 2. Apply from roots to ends and process for 15 min. 3. Rinse with warm water and gently emulsify until water runs clear. Shampoo and condition. Final Effect Style as desired! negative_passages.title: RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint (Light Gray)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Before you invest a lot of time and money to reglaze or replace a worn, washed-up tub, or have it covered over with an expensive bath-fitting liner, try RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint. For a fraction of the cost of remodeling, you can give a tired-looking tub or shower stall a like-new look for your own use, or to improve resale appeal. It creates a durable, low-sheen finish that not only looks great, it's washable and easy to maintain. This easy-to-use, one-part refinishing paint is more than just an affordable alternative for the price-conscious homeowner looking to touch up or resurface their tub. Its fast-drying formula lets you finish the job in a fraction of the time, making this an easy project to finish in a few hours. Just stir well and use a brush or roller to apply to properly prepared acrylic, fiberglass, or enamel surfaces. Apply 2-3 coats in a single day—waiting just 1 hour between coats—and your tub or shower will be ready to use in just 24 hours. RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint is a water-based coating, so it has no noxious fumes, which makes it great for indoor use. It's also very easy to clean up with just soap & water. To keep you safe from slips and falls, apply a couple coats of RTG Shower & Tub Non-Slip Paint to the floor. It contains a non-skid additive that's not gritty or abrasive, so it's comfortable against the skin. Best of all, it comes in a color to match the refinishing paint. The bathtub and shower are focal points of any bathroom. Compare to Rustoleum Tub & Tile Refinishing Paint and AquaFinish Bathtub and Tile Refinishing Kit. RTG Shower & Tub Refinishing Paint features an appealing satin sheen, great coverage, & easy maintenance. Important surface prep instructions: Do not use on ceramic, porcelain, or tile. All surfaces must be clean, dry and free of grease, dirt, and oils. Carefully mask off and sand with 220 grit sandpaper. Remove residue and wipe clean with lint-free rag and denatured alcohol. negative_passages.text: Product Description Four makeup brushes condensed into two, freeing up space in your makeup bag and making transformations from day to night a breeze. Each end of the makeup brushes has a description on how to use it. Shade & Define Brush: Apply shadow all over the lid with the shading brush then flip it over and use the defining brush to add contour to the eyes. Blend & Smudge Brush: Blend eyeshadow to eliminate harsh lines with the blending brush, and use the smudge brush to create soft definition along the lash line. Synthetic bristles are cruelty free. Experience the incredibly soft touch of cruelty-free bristles EcoTools beauty solutions promote Living Beautifully! We are inspired by beauty inside and out, and in the world around us. While we always want to look our best, we feel even better when we can make earth-conscious choices. EcoTools remains a favorite of celebrities, beauty editors and women around the world. Best known for our incredibly soft cosmetic brushes and handles, we take pride in offering a collection of cosmetic makeup brushes, hairbrushes, lashes and bath products that feature innovative, materials. Our includes natural materials, reusable pouches, post-consumer recycled paper and plastic, and recyclable packaging. The eco pouch is phthalate-free and PVC-free. Cleaning your Makeup Brushes Unclean makeup brushes transfer old makeup, germs, and bacteria to your skin each time you use them. Ideally, you should wash them once a week, and here’s the best way how: Run the bristles of makeup brush under warm running water. Careful not to get the ferrules and handles wet. Apply a drop of gentle shampoo or clarifying cleanser to bristles and work into a light lather. Rinse bristles thoroughly under warm, running water. Continue rinsing until water runs clear. Use a cloth to absorb excess water and reshape the bristles Lay your makeup brushes flat or “handles up” to air dry. negative_passages.text: Product Description Molluscum Contagiosum Treatment for Children And Adults Molluscum Contagiosum is a condition that commonly occurs in children but it is lesser known for its spread among adults. The condition is treatable and will go away when it is addressed correctly. Choosing Naturasil for Molluscum is a natural, painless alternative to traditional methods and you will be glad that you made it. We are here to help you every step of the way. It is time to get rid of that pesky, itchy, and infectious Molluscum Contagiosum virus for good. There Has To Be Instructions On This Bottle! So... Where Are They? If you are asking yourself this question, we promise that you would not be the only one. You can find your directions behind the drug facts box and warning label. You will find the end of the label by looking for the black arrow (as shown). As you peel it back, you will notice the directions are on the inner part of the label. Read more Step-By-Step Instructions Step One: Wash Your Hands Before you start using our product, make sure to wash and dry the affected area thoroughly. It will be important to keep this area clean throughout treatment. We recommend using out Naturasil Molluscum Soap to speed relief. Step Two: Apply Topical Liquid Directly To Molluscum Bumps Put Topical liquid on three - four (3-4) times daily to affected areas. Apply directly to molluscum bumps and allow for product to dry on skin. Step Three: Stay Consistent Throughout Treatment Molluscum bumps will diminish and flake away over two - six (2-6) weeks with diligent application. *Skin test for tolerability as some are sensitive to essential oils. **Discontinue use if irritation or reaction occurs. Read more Trusted Molluscum Brand Effectively & gently clears molluscum bumps Relieves itching & discomfort Essential oil blend Backed by 18+ years of research Easy to apply Pain-free: no acids, freezing, or burning Read more Child-Safe Formulation Bill Carlson created Naturasil for Molluscum after having witnessed his own son contract the viral condition when he was 6 years old. Fed up with pharmaceutical solutions, he set off to experiment and develop our effective , natural formula, which is proven , trusted, dermatologist approved, and 100% pain-free. Read more Easy to Apply Use the applicator brush (attached to the cap) and gently brush each molluscum papule with the Naturasil solution. Apply two - three (2-3) times per day to the affected area until symptoms disappear. For external use only. Always patch test for skin tolerability. Backed by 18+ Years of Research Proudly made in small-batches in the USA, Naturasil for Molluscum is backed by over 18 years of research and designed with simplicity and effectiveness. Our powerful essential oil blend causes the molluscum to dry up and flake away painlessly. Completely Pain-Free Naturasil for Molluscum is an all-natural solution containing only high-quality essential oils and botanical ingredients to cause molluscum papules to dry up and flake away. There are absolutely no acids, freezing, or burning medications used in the formula of our product . Read more Try A Natural Approach First - No Tears, No Fears, No Worries! Traditional methods include cryotherapy (freezing), curettage (scooping/scraping), laser therapy (burning), or topical creams containing acids or chemicals. These treatments can be effective for some but always need a proper time allotment to heal. Luckily, Naturasil for Molluscum offers a pain-free way to get rid of this pesky problem. This solution treats effectively and naturally without pain, scarring, or harsh ingredients found in many traditional methods, so you can keep the smiles and good times together as long as possible.

negative_passages.title: Dry Body Brush,Gentle Exfoliation,Remove Cellulite,Lymphatic Drainage,Slong Brush Can go Straight to The Back,Making The Whole Body Skin Softer,Improve Blood Circulation, Set of 2, with 2 Wall Hook
negative_passages.text: Product Description "The Secret to Healthy, Beautiful Skin" Do you want to have healthy, smooth, flawless and beautiful skin? TEMEAYE's Dry Skin Brush is your solution! Our Body Brush Buying Guide If you’re looking for glowing skin that looks healthy and radiant, it’s time to get a body brush. This is a special beauty tool that is used to brush off the dull layer of flaky skin at the top. A body brush can help you to unclog pores, remove any dead skin and exfoliate your body. It’s a great tool for anyone who wants smooth skin that feels soft and looks shiny. In addition, body brushing can actually help to redistribute fat that is stored in your skin. This smooths out your cellulite so your skin looks firmer and tighter. You can dry brush your body before you take a bath or shower. Brushing your body should be done for a few minutes each day and can be done on a daily basis. Just be sure to use the right kind of brush so that you don’t irritate your skin. How Does it Work? It goes without saying that dry brushing exfoliates the skin by removing dry, dead skin, but it works wonders for the inside of your body too. In a similar vein to massaging, dry brushing kickstarts your lymphatic system and helps remove toxins from your body. It also unclogs your pores so your skin can breathe easier and the process smooths out the appearance of cellulite too. Most professionals suggest doing it pre-shower So standing in your shower before you turn on the water might be the perfect time and place to do it. Start at the bottom and work your way up using long sweeping motions towards the heart. Brush over the same areas several times, but avoid scrubbing. On your tummy you can use circular, clockwise movements. Once you’re brushed from your toes to your top – be careful of the more sensitive areas like your stomach and chest. Have a shower, pat yourself dry and moisturise with a cream or oil. TEMEAYE dry skin brushing tips: Start out gentle: Make sure that the dry brushing is done softly in the initial stages so that soreness is avoided. Application of a little more pressure can be done as your skin gets used to dry brushing. Use on dry skin: Make sure to brush completely dry skin only. Shower after skin brushing to remove exfoliated skin. Wounds: Do not do any skin brushing over cuts, wounds or rashes. Brush towards the Heart: The brush strokes should move towards your heart. This improvement in blood circulation is why so many people feel extremely refreshed after an energetic session of dry brushing. The Body Brush Tips and Advice: When selecting a body brush, the shape is important because it will determine where on your body you can reach. A brush with a small handle is great for easily accessible parts of your body, such as your arms and legs. However, you will have to bend in order to reach your lower half. However, a body brush with a long handle is ideal for reaching your back, or the bottom half of your legs if you have trouble reaching that area. The bristles of the body brush are key. You don’t want to get anything too soft, as that will not provide you with the benefits you need. However, bristles that are too stiff may irritate and hurt your skin. Opt for something in the middle in terms of firmness. Bristles can be made from natural material. Fun Fact When brushing your skin, it’s best to brush towards the heart. This means that if you’re brushing your arms, you should start near your fingers and brush towards your shoulder. It’s best to use small and firm brush strokes. You can also use a circular motion where you have more room, such as on your back or stomach. Be sure not to press too hard, as this can hurt your skin. If you break the skin or cause any irritation, it’s best to take a break till your skin heals.

negative_passages.text: Product Description Uniquely Designed Bristles We selected the highest quality cruelty-free harvested boar bristles we could find and designed them to contour your body with our unique contour-cut bristles. Thick Sturdy and Soft 100% Cotton Strap Made to Last Our brush strap is made from 100% woven cotton. It is extra thick to be softer on your hand plus it provides a more secure grip. Plastic-Free Brush Means Less Waste and More Secure Bristles One important quality that makes our brush stand above the rest is our brush is plastic-free. This means no plastic waste added to our already overflowing plastic waste issue. Unlike brush heads with a plastic base, our bristles are more securely fastened to the wood itself. Brush heads with a plastic base have the bristles attached to the plastic and then it's glued to the wood. This will allow the bristles to come apart more easily. Complete Exfoliation Treatment Set Treat yourself to a mini spa day with our complete set of exfoliation tools to pamper your body from head to toe. Our complete dry brushing set will have you covered before and during your shower to smooth out cellulite, exfoliate dry skin, remove calluses on your feet, and gently cleanse your face. Premium Konjac Sponge with Activated Bamboo Charcoal What is Konjac? Konjac is a plant native to Japan, Korea & China and contains skin-friendly antioxidants and minerals. The aqueous layer of the sponge is slightly alkaline, which balances the pH of your skin and effectively cleanses away oil, dirt, and blackheads from pores, even in the absence of soap or cleanser. For over 100 years in Japan, they have been bathing their newborn babies with the Konjac sponge. This is an example just how soft, gentle and safe Konjac sponges are to our skin. Exfoliating Gloves Body Exfoliator Our spa-quality nylon textured gloves are for use in the shower. They help eliminate dry, flaking or dead skin cells, prevent ingrown hairs, itchy, bumpy and dry skin, increases blood circulation and removes harmful toxins from your body while leaving your skin smooth and silky soft. Our spa gloves can help with acne and keratosis pilaris as well. They are designed to stretch to fit most hand sizes. Premium Callus Remover for Feet and Hands Remove your calluses, corns and dead skin from your feet and bring back the smooth confidence of your feet! Enjoy the silky soft feel of your heels after each use. Make the switch from harmful toxic synthetic pumice stones and treat your feet to the safe, naturally occurring lava stones and keep your feet feeling smooth and happy! negative_passages.title: The FootMate System Foot Brush Scrubber + Rejuvenating Gel - Blue - Made in The USA
negative_passages.text: Product Description THE FOOTMATE SYSTEM FOOT BRUSH SCRUBBER + REJUVENATING GEL YOUR FEET WILL LOVE YOU!... REFRESH, RESTORE, RENEW!... The FootMate System leaves your feet thoroughly cleaned, conditioned, and massaged, including the often neglected areas between the toes. The massage stimulates circulation and blood flow to the feet, and produces a feeling of all-over well-being. Our customers report that it’s better than pumice stones, shower brushes, or loofahs for soothing, softening, and renewing their feet! AN INGENIOUS, ONE-OF-A-KIND DESIGN - OPTIMAL FOOT TRANSFORMATION TECHNOLOGY The contoured brush design of the FootMate System cradles the foot for comfortable positioning and features soft inner bristles to gently massage tender areas of the foot, together with stiff outer bristles to smooth rough and/or dry skin. Suction cups to help keep the FootMate in place during use, footpads on either side ensure the FootMate stays in place on surfaces where suction cups won't easily adhere, and an anti-skid surface helps ensure balance. IMPROVING CIRCULATION FROM THE GROUND UP! If you’ve ever experienced hot, tired, burning or aching feet, you may have poor circulation. Symptoms such as these can be experienced by people who sit for long periods of time, such as those who works in an office setting. The FootMate System invigorates the feet and stimulates circulation with its foot massage, helping to relieve foot aches and pains. NO NEED TO BEND OR STOOP OVER! The FootMate System’s foot brush is designed to go in your bath or shower to clean and massage your feet without you having to bend or stoop over. That makes it not only easy to use, but ideal for the elderly, anyone with back problems, pregnant women, athletes, people that have trouble bending or seeing their feet while showering or bathing, or anyone wanting a soothing, stimulating way to clean and massage their feet in the shower. A VITAL TOOL FOR DIABETICS - STIMULATING BLOOD FLOW FOR DIABETIC FOOT CARE With diabetes, proper foot care is imperative. With proper foot care, most serious health problems associated with diabetes can be prevented. This includes washing your feet daily. Regular use of The FootMate System can help stimulate blood flow to the feet and aid in keeping circulation problems to a minimum. The American Diabetes Association estimates that one in five people with diabetes who seek hospital care do so for foot problems. THE ART OF REFLEXOLOGY, AND A BUNDLE OF POTENTIAL HEALTH BENEFITS REFLEXOLOGY - A LONG HISTORY From the beginning of time, people practiced massage therapy, and many ancient societies noticed that there were correlations between applying pressure on the feet and relief of discomfort in certain organs. Reflexology was introduced to the United States in 1913 by William H. Fitzgerald, M.D. an ear, nose, and throat specialist. Fitzgerald claimed that applying pressure had an anesthetic effect on other areas of the body. Dr. Fitzgerald went on to map out these zones and created the first modern reflexology charts. REFLEXOLOGY AND WELL BEING Is stress or anxiety from the constant pressures of work and home life wearing you out? Perhaps you need a foot massage! A foot massage, or foot reflexology, does more than just make your feet feel better; it is thought to alleviate many ailments including back pain, stress and headaches. EASE THE BURDEN ON YOUR NERVOUS SYSTEM The art of reflexology states that the foot is a microcosm of the entire body, and that specific points correspond to different parts and organs of the body. Massaging of the feet is believed by many to ease stress, tension, pain, and balance the flow of energy in the body - allowing your nervous system to get a calming break. Plus, it just feels great! THE FOOTMATE SYSTEM MAKES CONTINUOUS TREATMENT EASY! A critical discovery by Dr. Fitzgerald was that reflexology massage had many healing benefits when an individual received continuous, periodic treatments. The buildup of stress is a continuous process, and the relief of such build up must also be continuous. To get the full benefit of foot reflexology massage, it needs to be administered on a frequent basis. Having to always go to a massage therapist to receive treatment is inconvenient. Another alternative is using the FootMate System - you’ll have everything you need right at home! A UNIQUE REJUVENATING GEL TO INVIGORATE YOUR FEET A SPECIAL FORMULATION WITH MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS The FootMate System's unique Rejuvenating Gel is a cleanser and conditioner all in one that we have specially formulated for feet. It can also be used as an all-over body wash. The FootMate Rejuvenating Gel will leave your feet soft and thoroughly cleansed. H IGH QUALITY, EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS (AND NO HARSH ADDITIVES!) Our Rejuvenating Gel contains no Parabens, SLS, Petrolatum, Synthetic Fragrances, EDTA, Artificial Colors or Phthalates. Instead, we use natural Tea Tree Oil (Melaleuca alternifoli). It is an ideal ingredient for daily foot care. We also use aloe, which helps to heal and repair skin, and Vitamin E, to protect the skin from damaging UV rays and premature wrinkling. A N WEALTH OF FOOT CARE BENEFITS Use of our Rejuvenating Gel can help: - Decrease occurrences of foot odor - Reduce susceptibility to athlete’s foot - Disinfect any minor cuts / abrasions - Aid in good toenail health YOUR FEET TAKE YOU EVERYWHERE, SO TREAT THEM RIGHT!... FEATURES UNIQUE TO FOOTMATE - Contoured foot design to cradle your foot - More than 11,000 bristles - Suction cups, footpads, and anti-skid surface TRUST FOOTMATE QUALITY AND EXPERTISE - Proudly Manufactured in USA - No Parabens, SLS, Petrolatum, Synthetic Fragrances, EDTA, Artificial Colors or Phthalates - Verified American Made Beauty Product You and Your Feet Deserve the Best! Are You Ready for Very Happy Feet? The FootMate System can offer so many potential benefits to your foot health and overall well-being. Your Feet Will Love You!

negative_passages.text: Product Description No More Bed Head! Taming Matte Cream is specially formulated for delicate hair: a gentle and effective way to calm messy tresses. We take the safety and quality of our products seriously: Reviewed under the care of a dermatologist to ensure products are hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive skin Manufactured in Pennsylvania in a cGMP-compliant facility specializing in personal care products All raw materials, components, production lines routinely inspected to ensure quality finished goods Reviewed by a panel of Mom to ensure safety and effectiveness Safe, Natural Style for Your Little Ones At 6 months old my twins started having hair that grew straight up! It was so hard to manage. Having a bath and going to bed with wet hair gave them the worst bedhead! I tried a gel and it was sticky, I tried mousse and it left their hair stiff. I wanted something natural, safe for kids, that didn't leave their hair sticky, stiff, or greasy. My experience as a beauty and haircare marketing executive paid off! I was able to find a chemist to bring my idea to life and the business was born. Our products are safe, effective, dermatologist and Mom approved - oh, and they actually work! Our taming cream is specially formulated for delicate baby and toddler hair: a natural, gentle, yet effective way to calm messy little tresses. Products contain safe, clinically tested ingredients, including coconut and jojoba oil, to gently hold the hair in place without chemicals or harsh ingredients. Use a dime-sized dollop, spread evenly into palms, smooth or scrunch into hair and go! Safe, Natural Healthy Hair When we developed the Taming Matte Cream, we wanted to make sure our products were not only safe and natural, but good for delicate baby, toddler, and big kids hair. Our vast array of products comes in a range of colors to meet every mood and self-expression. What is a cuticle? The cuticle is a layer of clear skin located along the bottom edge of your finger or toe. Dried cuticle can lift nail polish which leads to nail color chipping earlier than anticipated. What causes dry cuticles? Multiple things can contribute to dry cuticles. Such as cold winter weather, expoing your hand to drying products such as cleaning supply can cause dry cuticles. Apply Cuticle Oil daily to keep skin nourished. Why does my Nail Lacquer get thick? Nail Lacquer contains solvents which evaporate with use and cause your nail polish to get thick. Use Nail Lacquer thinner to replace the evaporated solvents and you're good to go again! How to gently remove excess cuticle? Grab OPI Exfoliating Cuticle Cream and apply a small amount to each cuticle. Leave it on for at least 30 seconds. Take a reusable cuticle stick and push back the eponychium to reveal true cuticle on each nail. Once you’re done, wipe away the excess. Can harsh soaps, hand sanitizers, and nail polish remover dry out your cuticles? Yes. Some products can dry out cuticles. Try a remover that has hydrating benefits like OPI Expert Touch Lacquer Remover and remember to apply Nail & Cuticle Oil every day.

positive_passages.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Venture 7
positive_passages.text: Product Description Take on the toughest terrain in confidence with the men's GEL-VENTURE 7 performance trail running shoe by ASICS. Featuring GEL technology and an EVA midsole, this shoe is made for athletes who love to run in the great outdoors. GEL technology in the rearfoot area of the shoe provides shock absorption where you need it most, while the ORTHOLITE sockliner provides an additional layer of cushioning underfoot. It even molds to the shape of your feet, making each run even more comfortable than the last. Extra support comes from the sturdy upper crafted from synthetic leather, while the internal heel counter gently helps your foot remain in its natural line of motion, making for a more efficient stride. Meanwhile the EVA midsole protects your feet against impact and increases rebound, giving you an energetic feeling as you clock up the miles. Durable and practical, the GEL-VENTURE 7 shoe makes an excellent training partner whether you're new to trail running or a seasoned pro. positive_passages.title: adidas Men's Lite Racer Adapt Running Shoe
positive_passages.text: From the brand Previous page LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT RUNNING SHOES? Check out adidas’ collection of ultra-comfortable, performance-ready products sure to suit your unique needs. GET READY Get ready to take on your next run in comfort and style with an adidas Running shoe. SCROLL TO LEARN MORE Scroll to learn more about what adidas running shoes are available on Amazon.com today. Shop all Men’s Running Shoes Visit the Store MEN'S SUPERNOVA SUPPORTIVE WITH BREATHABLE MESH - We studied runners' movements to create a shoe with targeted breathability, flexibility & support. MEN'S FLUIDFLOW MADE FOR INDOOR & OUTDOOR PLAY - Knit upper molds to your foot for natural movement. Bounce cushioning provides comfort & flexibility. MEN'S LITE RACER ADAPT RUNNING-INSPIRED WITH ADAPTABLE STYLE - Sharp, simple & slip-on. Mesh upper with a snug, cushioned feel keeps you comfortably cool. MEN'S ULTRABOOST 20 TAKES YOU FROM THE RUN, TO THE GYM, & BEYOND - Versatility for any day, any distance. Featuring a responsive Boost midsole & stability. HOW TO START RUNNING If you’re waiting for the perfect day to start running, the secret is… there isn’t one. Start small and start today. For new runners, it’s important to follow these steps to prep yourself for a good run and avoid burn out and injury. 1. CHECK YOUR LACES - Although you don’t need to purchase a whole new running wardrobe, it is important to consider your footwear. 2. DON'T SKIP THE WARMUP - A dynamic warmup is important no matter how far you’re going to run. It activates the muscles you’re about to use, warming your body up, prepping it to perform. 3. STAY CONSISTENT - Going out for short runs every week adds up more than one heroic effort per month. 4. MIND YOUR PACE - Turn to breath as a way to measure. Conversational pace is a great way to gauge if you’re running the appropriate pace for your fitness level. 5. COOL DOWN AND RECOVER - Stretching while your body is warm from running is key to alleviating soreness and is where the recovery process begins. -Tips courtesy of Jessie Zapo, performance coach for adidas Runners NYC. positive_passages.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Venture 6 Running Shoe
positive_passages.text: Product Description Get out and explore in the redesigned GEL-Venture 6. Designed to take on rugged terrain, this model comes complete with a trail-specific outsole and high-abrasion rubber for confidence-inspiring traction. Rearfoot GEL cushioning absorbs shock to keep you comfortable as you pound along the path, while the removable sockliner lets you insert custom orthotics for an even more personalized fit. Weight: 11.2 oz. Heel Height: 20mm. Forefoot Height: 10mm. Read more Superior Comfort Rearfoot GEL technology cushioning system attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance. Removable Sockliner The sockliner can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic. Trail Specific Outsole Reverse lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain. AHAR (ASICS High Abrasion Rubber) is placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability. Read more Find the Right Fit GECKO XT GEL-VENTURE 6 GEL-NIMBUS 20 GEL-KAHANA 8 GT-2000 6 Trail Pronation UNDERPRONATION (Supination) UNDER, NEUTRAL NEUTRAL OVER, NEUTRAL OVERPRONATION How Your Foot Contacts the Ground The outer side of the heel hits the ground at an increased angle with little or no normal pronation, causing a large transmission of shock through the lower leg. The foot lands on outside of the heel, then rolls inward (pronates) to absorb shock and support body weight. The foot lands on outside of heel, then rolls inward (pronates) excessively, transferring weight to inner edge instead of ball of the foot. Push Off The pressure is on smaller toes on outside of foot. There is even distribution from the front of the foot. Big toe and second toe do majority of the work. Foot Type High arches Normal aches Low arches

negative_passages.title: Dr. Martens Men's Sussex Chukka Boot
negative_passages.text: Product Description The sussex 3-eye chukka boot was designed for the service industries with a focus on exceptional slip-resistance. Slip resistant sole reduces the risk of slips and falls on hazardous surfaces. The Dr. Martens air cushioned sole provides additional shock absorbing properties. The sussex features tumbled, full grain leather, breathable linings and a high quality removable, contoured eva footbed. Dr. Martens is the stuff of legends. It all began near Munich, Germany in 1945 when Dr. Klaus Maertens injured his foot in a skiing accident in the Bavarian Alps. To make walking easier during the healing process, he designed a shoe with an air-cushioned sole. Using old rubber tires, he constructed soles that had air trapped within closed compartments. He showed his prototype to his engineer/inventor friend, Dr. Herbert Funck, and together they decided to develop and produce the shoes. Not only did the shoe solve the doctor's immediate problem, but it also started to sell well in Germany. By 1959 the two decided that they needed a company to produce and distribute the shoes, then called Dr. Maertens, in other parts of the world. At first, many manufacturers rejected the concept of an air cushioned sole as a short-lived gimmick. However, the R. Griggs Group, located in the village of Wollaston in England, decided to go along with the idea by creating the first work boot with the revolutionary sole. On the first of April 1960, the first cherry red eight-eyelet work boot was produced and named 1460. To sell the brand name better in England, the name was anglicized to Dr. Martens. The range was branded AirWair and the rest is history. Product Description The sussex 3-eye chukka boot was designed for the service industries with a focus on exceptional slip-resistance. Slip resistant sole reduces the risk of slips and falls on hazardous surfaces. The Dr. Martens air cushioned sole provides additional shock absorbing properties. The sussex features tumbled, full grain leather, breathable linings and a high quality removable, contoured eva footbed. Dr. Martens is the stuff of legends. On the first of April 1960, the first cherry red eight-eyelet work boot was produced and named 1460. To sell the brand name better in England, the name was anglicized to Dr. Martens. The range was branded AirWair and the rest is history.From the manufacturer About Us Dr. Martens’ appeal to people who have their own individual style but share a united spirit – authentic characters who stand for something. People who possess a proud sense of self- expression. People who are different. On a stylistic level, Dr. Martens simple silhouettes allows their wearers to adopt the boots and shoes as part of their own individual and very distinctive style; on a practical level, their famous durability and comfort make them ideal for the unforgiving world of gigs and street fashion; and then finally on an emotional level, they are a badge of attitude and empowerment. However, it wasn’t always this way: Dr. Martens were originally a modest work-wear boot that was even sold as a gardening shoe at one stage. Read more

negative_passages.title: Drymax R-Gear No Show Running Socks for Men & Women (3-pairs)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Read more R-Gear DRYMAX Premium Custom Socks :: This is our MOST POPULAR SELLING SOCK for a reason! Looking for the coolest running socks ever? Then you want Road Runner Sports socks built with over 35 years of serious sock-testing experience. You know how important perfect-fitting performance socks are and so do the more than 1 million athletes who put on our socks EVERY DAY! Never fear blisters, stinky feet or an uncomfortable fit as we make the most comfortable socks around for men, women and children. Your Premium Custom Socks combine performance, comfort and style to give you a PERFECT FIT. Check out our length and cushion options in the chart below: We put it to the test. Here's how the Drymax R-Gear Socks work. Check out the video for full product features. Wet, Sweaty Socks We submerged a Drymax R-Gear Sock entirely in water until fully wet to simulate sweat during a hard workout. Wet on the Outside We patted the outside of the sock on a paper towel to see how much water had collected on the outside of the sock. Dry on the Inside Then we flipped the sock inside out and patted it again on the paper towel. The inside of the sock was completely dry ! Still Wet on the Outside We flipped it right side out once again, patted it on the paper towel one more time, and found that the water was still on the outside of the sock. These socks move sweat to the outside so your feet stay dry inside ! Read more Questions & Answers Q1: Does this have a tab or cover the achilles to prevent blisters? Even when they are no show... A: Yes, these No Show socks have a single tab on the heel to help prevent rubbing against your shoe! Q2: Are these socks anatomically sized for the left and right foot? A: No, there's no Left/Right foot sizing. Q3: What is the letter on the toe of each sock? A: The letter depicts the size of the sock. Ex. L = Large, S = Small, etc. Wash & Care Instructions Drymax R-Gear Socks Machine wash warm. Tumble dry, low heat. Do not use bleach or fabric softener. Read more The Drymax Difference With five cuts and multiple cushion volumes to choose from, you'll find your perfect fit in no time. Take a look at the chart below to explore all of our Drymax sock options. negative_passages.title: Deer Stags Unisex-Child Gabe Oxford
negative_passages.text: Product Description A wonderful shoe for boys who needs a shoe to wear with school uniforms, or for dressier events. Padded insole keeps growing feet comfortable. The outsole is durable - a must for young boys! Deer Stags shoes have been sold in the United States since 1929. Known for our fully slip-lasted construction and comfort features, Deer Stags has become a top-selling brand in the dress casual category for national chains. According to NPD Fashionworld, our Times lace-up is the #1 selling dress casual shoe in the national chain sector. Product Description A wonderful shoe for boys who needs a shoe to wear with school uniforms, or for dressier events. Padded insole keeps growing feet comfortable. The outsole is durable - a must for young boys! Deer Stags shoes have been sold in the United States since 1929. Known for our fully slip-lasted construction and comfort features, Deer Stags has become a top-selling brand in the dress casual category for national chains. According to NPD Fashionworld, our Times lace-up is the #1 selling dress casual shoe in the national chain sector.From the brand Previous page When comfort counts, we’re there – Deer Stags is a 3rd generation family owned and operated shoe company that crafts comfortable and fashionable men’s and boys’ shoes for all ages and occasions. Slip on a pair, join our family and discover what it means to be comfortable. Family Favorite Styles How did we get our start? In 1929, Deer Stags pioneered a new kind of comfortable, flexible dress shoe. Today, all our shoes for men and kids, from slippers to sneakers to formal wear, are designed with your comfort as the top priority. Why do we love what we do? You deserve to be comfortable every day. We pride ourselves on the good design and quality construction that make this possible. What problem are we solving? We make comfort accessible to all by offering extended sizes and widths, unbeatable value, and styles for every use from workwear to vacation. Next page From the manufacturer About Us Comfort, value and style are the three qualities you look for in a shoe. So we built a company around these ideas. COMFORT We believe your new shoes should already feel broken in. This isn't a new philosophy for us. Decades ago, Deer Stags pioneered a new kind of construction that would finally make that annoying stiff dress shoe a thing of the past. We ended up with a flexible shoe as comfortable as a sneaker. Today, we are best known for our shock-absorbing technologies like the ultra-cushioned S.U.P.R.O. Sock orthotic. Read more VALUE Offering value is not just talk. It’s our brand and identity since 1929, and how we have thrived as a family in the shoe business since 1964. STYLE Or, as we prefer to call it: Listening. What you want from your shoes, in terms of wearability and style, changes over time.

negative_passages.title: Timberland Men's Icon Three-Eye Classic Shoe
negative_passages.text: Product Description Inspired by the laid-back lifestyle of coastal towns, Timberland’s iconic men’s boat shoes and loafers are a weekend style staple. Welcome in the warmer weather and choose a pair of classic deck shoes crafted for style and comfort. The Authentics three Eye Classic boat shoes are handcrafted, rugged and durable. The Timberland Authentics Three-Eye Classic Lug remains a true icon today thanks to its robust build and timeless aesthetic. Leather lining gives a plush underfoot feeling and our 360° lacing system makes for a secure fit. Sturdy, supportive and eco-friendly, this sole wonʼt let you down. The rubber lug outsole gives you traction. If you've been searching for a modern classic, check out this handsewn oxford from Timberland. Its flawlessly detailed leather upper offers traditional good looks and sits atop a deeply treaded traction outsole. Timberland set new industry standards for craftsmanship, durability and protection when it introduced an authentic, waterproof leather boot in 1973. A global leader in design, engineering and marketing of premium footwear, Timberland values consumers who cherish the outdoors and their time in it. negative_passages.title: Timberland Women's Mabel Town Waterproof Pull On Snow Boot
negative_passages.text: Product Description Amazon carries Timberland footwear for men, women, and kids: sandals, boots, casual oxfords, tall boots, hiking boots, waterproof boots, winter boots, and women's shoes and boots. Timberland makes rugged, durable, comfortable waterproof leather boots. Timberlands are premium and popular, bringing style, comfort, performance and eco-conscious elements to their leather waterproof shoes and boots. Timberland wheat six inch boot is waterproof, insulated, and a best seller. Timberland boots for men have premium leather boots, chelseas, chukkas, and classic boat shoes, sandals and hikers. Timberland technologies include sensorflex, mirrorfit, timber dry, gore-tex, ortholite, insulation, aerocore, waterproofing, and anti-fatigue footbeds. Classic boots and MT maddsen are outdoor hiking boots with waterproofing and insulation. Groveton, logan bay and altamont are best-selling casual Timberland men’s shoes. Women's Timberland boots are premium leather and nubuck chelseas, chukkas, tall boots, waterproof boots, and booties. Women's winter boots and rain boots with teddy fleece include camdale, nellie, sutherlin bay, and kiri up. Fashionable women's shoes and waterproof boots for spring and fall and outdoor hikers with gore-tex and comfort like maddsen and Norwood. Popular Timberland kids boots are 6 inch boots, waterproof hiking boots, and sandals. The adventure seeker sandal and crib booties, along with chukkas and winter boots. Timberland baby shoes, Timberland toddler shoes, Timberland kids shoes and Timberland big kid boots and shoes. Snow boots.Timberland pro is also part of Timberland and features both soft-toe and steel-toe boots for work and work wear. Timberland, llc is owned by vf corporation, which owns many other brands like vans, the north face, smart wool, Kipling, jansport. Some styles are made in the USA. Easy to find popular Timberlands as seen on celebrities (jay-z, pharrell, beyoncé, kardashians, kanye, kylie jenner, Bieber, Rihanna, drake). negative_passages.title: Dr. Martens Men's Tobias Boot
negative_passages.text: Product Description The tobias features a sleek silhouette chalk full of doc's iconic dna in a lighter contemporary style Dr. Martens is the stuff of legends. It all began near Munich, Germany in 1945 when Dr. Klaus Maertens injured his foot in a skiing accident in the Bavarian Alps. To make walking easier during the healing process, he designed a shoe with an air-cushioned sole. Using old rubber tires, he constructed soles that had air trapped within closed compartments. He showed his prototype to his engineer/inventor friend, Dr. Herbert Funck, and together they decided to develop and produce the shoes. Not only did the shoe solve the doctor's immediate problem, but it also started to sell well in Germany. By 1959 the two decided that they needed a company to produce and distribute the shoes, then called Dr. Maertens, in other parts of the world. At first, many manufacturers rejected the concept of an air cushioned sole as a short-lived gimmick. However, the R. Griggs Group, located in the village of Wollaston in England, decided to go along with the idea by creating the first work boot with the revolutionary sole. On the first of April 1960, the first cherry red eight-eyelet work boot was produced and named 1460. To sell the brand name better in England, the name was anglicized to Dr. Martens. The range was branded AirWair and the rest is history. negative_passages.title: HI-TEC Men's Altitude Waterproof Hiking Boot
negative_passages.text: Product Description Boasting waterproof, seam-sealed construction for unparalleled durability, the Altitude from Hi-Tec really goes the distance. This rugged and stylish hiking boot has a softly padded leather collar, fully gusseted leather tongue, and rustproof brass hardware. It also has a board last with a steel shank for added rigidity, a lightweight compression-molded EVA midsole for superior comfort, and a carbon rubber hiking outsole for traction. There's even a Comfort-Tec contoured sockliner to help support feet mile after mile. Established in 1978, Hi-Tec Sports USA pioneered the original lightweight hiking boot. Today, Hi-Tec continues to design and develop authentic outdoor footwear meticulously dedicated to comfort, light weight and quality. Hi-Tec Sports distributes in over 70 countries, forming a global footwear enterprise and selling over 10 million pairs of footwear annually. negative_passages.title: Johnston & Murphy Men's Melton Cap Toe | Formal Dress Shoe
negative_passages.text: From the brand Previous page How did we get our start? In 1850, William Dudley, a master English shoemaker, began crafting shoes out of his home in Newark, New Jersey. Thirty years later, James Johnston joined as a partner helping to create a line of durable, high fashion footwear. Style and superior craftsmanship was a winning combination. Eventually, Johnston partnered with William Murphy—and the Johnston & Murphy name quickly came to stand for the highest quality shoes in America. What makes our products unique? Our secret to modern classics is simple — the magic is in the making. Finishes that are foremost, leather & other materials that stand out as better and every last stitch considered. Our inspiration comes from everywhere, but when it comes to style, we use a distinctly American lens to shape our point of view. Why do we love what we do? A great pair of shoes lets you walk into the world with confidence. For over a century and a half, J & M has been outfitting legends, leaders (including every U.S. president since Millard Filmore) and discerning individuals with a way to step up and stand out. We are proud to put our name on everything we do. Fresh for Fall Visit the Store Next page Product Description Read more SHOP FOOTWEAR Shop our best-selling casuals, unmatched styled footwear that is engineered for maximum comfort, performance waterproof construction, and richly textured leather. negative_passages.title: ULTRAFINO Pieces Original Hat Size Reducer Sweatband Straw Wool Panama Fedora Cowboy Hats Cap
negative_passages.text: Product Description Read more Hat Sizer Reducers Have you ever purchased a beaver, wool, felt, straw, Panama hat or a Montecristi hat, but it turns out to be a bit too large? Now you can use these foam size reducer strips to get the perfect fit and eliminate a loose fit! Did you know Ultrafino was the first to invent the hat size reducer? Years later we've perfected our design to offer the best solution for a slightly loose hat. Read more Incredibly Easy to Use! Peel Carefully peel off the the plastic from the adhesive backing! Excellent Sun Protection With a UPF 50+ rating, these hats provide the perfect amount of shade during sunny weather! Stick Apply the adhesive strip under the sweatband of the hat! Read more Available in various sizes, colors, and quantities! The two 8-inch strips are self-adhesive on one side and made with 1/8"-thick sweat-resistant foam. The rounded edges make it extremely easy to peel back and place underneath the sweatband. With the use of both strips, these can reduce up to a full hat size without the hassle of returning the hat. Available in various sizes, colors, and quantities! Large 208-inch reducer roll for several hat size reductions. How to use: Trim to the desired size, peel the backing from the adhesive side, and place inside your hat's sweatband. Comfortable, breathable, and sweat-resistant. These can reduce several sizes without the hassle of returning the hat. Available in various sizes, colors, and quantities! These smaller strips make it easier to target and apply onto specific areas! To apply, peel the back and place inside your hat's sweatband where you need it snagged-up. These can reduce to a 1/2 hat size. Comfortable, soft and breathable Available in various sizes, colors, and quantities! Two 24 inch rolls. Perfect for completely filling the circumference of the inside. They are self adhesive on one side with 1/8"-thick durable quality. Peel the back and place inside your hat's sweatband where you need it" snagged-up". These can reduce the size down by 1-3 sizes without the hassle of returning the hat. Original Strips Full Roll Mini Strips Mini Rolls About Ultrafino The Panama hat is a finely woven hat made out of toquilla palms on Ecuador’s Pacific coast. The finer the weave, the finer the hat. A hat that is considered to be of Ultrafino grade contains at least 600 weaves per square inch and takes about 6 months to make. When the company was started in 2003 the first hat ever sold was an Ultrafino grade Panama Hat. The name Ultrafino had a certain feeling of excitement, uniqueness, and quality. We wanted all of our products to radiate the same feeling of owning an Ultrafino grade hat. And so began Ultrafino Panama Hats. Ultrafino means ultra-fine in Spanish and it has become the raw definition of the company. Everything we do is aligned to the name. We strive to provide ultra-fine service while providing ultra-fine quality hats. However, we do this without putting social responsibility aside. Ultrafino purchases directly from the weavers, cutting out the middleman and allowing us to pay the weavers more to support their families. We strive to provide fair wages and conditions for those who make our hats, to treat them as the valuable part of the company that they are. We do not see them as workers, we see them as talented artisans. And we see us as promoters who help share their art with the rest of the world. It is one of Ultrafino’s goal to create a company where everyday purchases can have a positive impact on the world. Especially, to the Ecuadorian communities where the artisans live. The Future The core values of Ultrafino are trust, integrity, quality, and social responsibility. We believe it is important to know where your money is going and who is benefiting from your purchase. Our goal is to provide high-quality headwear while improving the lives of those who made the product. Weaving is an art that is unfortunately dying. We at Ultrafino feel passionate about the conservation of this art. The introduction of automated machines and the push for lowering cost is what is destroying this art. By continuing to show demand for handwoven Panama Hats, Ultrafino gives incentives for the weavers to continue weaving and continue showing younger generations how to weave. Effectively, this is the main reason hand weaving is still around and why it will continue to be around. Ultrafino was founded on the idea that every hat has a history, and if you listen closely it will tell you of the hands that carefully crafted it. We do not sell hats, we sell works of art with stories and rich history behind them Read more

Front and back reflective striping and fluorescent yellow/green with color blocking keeps you visible while also hiding soil and stains in the area that needs it most. Ansi 107 type o, class 1 compliant.From the manufacturer About Us WHERE WE CAME FROM In 1923 two brothers and their cousin set up shop to sell bib overalls under a sign that read “Harlin Bros. & Williams.” This humble operation held fast to a few simple values — great service, comfort, and durability. So, business grew. The family expanded their catalog — a new line of premium workwear. The big times. They needed a name to match. While kicking around some ideas, one of the brothers reached for Red Cap Brazil Smoking Tobacco in his pocket. There it was — the bright red jockey cap on the tobacco label was the perfect icon. Inspired, they created the distinctive Red Kap logo in 1927. By 1939, the family was selling affordable matched-set workwear and chambray shirts. Times were good. Until WWII when the country was thrown into turmoil. By 1960, Red Kap had solidified its place as a major player in the workwear industry. Read more

negative_passages.title: Pacific Coast Original KD's Biker Sunglasses (Black Frame/Silver Mirror Lens)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Yes, the sunglasses that Jax Teller and other Sons of Anarchy club members wear are The Original KD's, made by Pacific Coast Sunglasses. The Sons of Anarchy TV show chose our sunglasses because nothing screams biker like The Original KD's. KD's are the number 1 selling biker sunglasses in the world and the motorcycle riding glasses that bikers everywhere ask for by name. This little black framed sunglass has been extremely popular with bikers for over 60 years because they stay on your head and keep the wind out of your eyes by fitting tightly on the temples and nose bridge. And most importantly, KD sunglasses look cool. For those searching for polarized sunglasses you will be happy to know that we offer KD's with a polarized grey lens (#2019) as well as a lot of other color lenses. And by the way, KD's aren't just sunglasses for men; women love the performance, style and variety of lens colors KD's offer. The BeltBro Titan fits 1.5” inch belt loops, standard size for Men’s pants and shorts. It’s ultra light, small and comfortable. Wear the BeltBro through the airport without any hassle. The 1.5-inch BeltBro is made to fit any common mens pants and shorts. YOUR PANTS WILL NEVER FALL DOWN All pants and shorts with belt loops are spaced differently. Therefore, included in your order are 1 small (10"), 1 medium (13") and 1 large (16") BeltBro Titan which allow you to choose the correct size for the spacing between your belt loops on one side of your pants. Many customers order 2 BeltBros to secure both sides of their pants evenly. BRING NEW LIFE TO YOUR FAVORITE CLOTHING The BeltBro Titan is made of a soft elastic fiber band with nylon and polyester, integrated into an industrial strength design. negative_passages.title: 1mm-16mm Solid .925 Sterling Silver Flat Cuban Link Curb Chain Necklace or Bracelet
negative_passages.text: Product Description Made in Italy using authentic .925 sterling silver, this premium-quality nickel-free Cuban link curb chain features links that gleam with beveled edges. Each chain fastens with a sturdy lobster claw clasp, stamped with ".925 Italy" authenticity hallmark. It's gift-giving ready to people of all ages (kids / teens / adults) and genders (men / women / boys / girls) - as it is offered in a vast array of sizes (width / thickness / lengths), enabling you to purchase the perfect chain (necklace / bracelet / anklet) of your choice by selecting your desired width (thin / medium / thick / chunky) and lengths (7"-10" for bracelets / 10"-11" for anklets / 16"-36" for necklaces) - or create a matching set by purchasing a necklace and a bracelet of the same/similar width, to go with the length / size that best matches your desired fit / look. Also included with each chain is an anti-tarnish velvet bag, a lifetime authenticity card, and a premium microfiber jewelry polishing cloth to help clean, shine, & maintain your sterling silver jewelry. Our Curb chains are conveniently offered in range of width options from as thin as 0.7mm to as thick as 4.5mm These curated selection of sterling silver curb link chains capture the essence of timeless style Each Italian crafted chain embodies the pinnacle of impeccable quality and craftsmanship Nothing but pure .925 sterling silver is transformed into our classic necklaces at the skillful hands of Italian artisans Can be worn solo, with a pendant, or stacked with other chain necklaces Made in Italy, Pure .925 Sterling Silver, Superior Craftsmanship Genuine .925 sterling silver with a high-polished finish (no plating). Made in Italy Features ".925 Italy" authenticity hallmark What Qualifies as Real Sterling Silver? To be deemed sterling silver, the chain's metal content must be at least 92.5% pure silver. The sterling silver hallmark stamp of “.925” indicates it’s composed of 92.5% pure silver. Read more Deluxe microfiber polishing cloth to keep your jewelry looking fresh Each chain ships with a lint-free microfiber jewelry polishing cloth to give your sterling silver jewelry a brilliant shine with incredible ease without having to handle messy jewelry cleaners. Travel Size Easy to Use Works Wonders Instructions (also included in packaging): Use the treated interior white cloth to gently polish your jewelry as it removes tarnish, dirt and fingerprints Finish by using the exterior black cloth to buff for a gleaming, high luster shine Removing tarnish couldn’t be easier Sterling silver naturally tarnishes, but it can easily be removed using the included polishing cloth. With less than 2 minutes of use, the cloth will remove 99% of tarnish visible to the eye and restore brilliance to sterling silver jewelry, while adding protection to limit or prevent future tarnish. Read more Your Trusted Source for Hypoallergenic Sterling Silver 100% Nickel-Free & Hypoallergenic Contains no nickel Will not cause allergic reactions Ready for gift-giving Why hypoallergenic jewelry? It's designed for those who experience an allergic reaction to the metal nickel. Hypoallergenic jewelry such as authentic sterling silver should never contain nickel. .925 sterling silver is an alloy that consists of 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% of other metal(s), typically copper. Most people who have a skin allergy to nickel can safely wear our chains without having any kind of allergic reactions to the skin. Tarnish-Resistant Velvet Pouch Each chain ships tucked nicely into a tarnish-resistant velvet jewelry pouch that can be used to store silver jewelry to prevent tarnish or to store the jewelry when traveling. Craftsmanship & quality that we're sure you'll appreciate WE DON'T COMPROMISE ON QUALITY - We may not have the cheapest sterling silver jewelry, but that is because we pay attention to detail and make sure that the jewelry we sell meets our high standards. We take pride in the quality of the jewelry we sell and have built a reputation for selling top quality jewelry. This means that you may feel you are paying more, but we know that you will be satisfied with your investment into a premium quality chain that will last you a lifetime. We make sure the sterling silver chains that we offer will not make our customers feel embarrassed or ashamed to give as a gift. EACH CHAIN INSPECTED TWICE BY OUR QUALITY CONTROL TEAM - Our quality control team proudly goes above and beyond while adhering to strict process controls in which each sterling silver chain receives individual attention by two separate team members for approval. Upon packing, each item is scrutinized for compliance as well as inspected for physical and clasp mechanical defects. Read more

The Mighty Wallet is the world’s best-selling Tyvek Wallet. Tyvek’s paper like properties makes this design a perfect fit for all coloring enthusiasts. Created in 2005 by Terrence Kelleman, the Mighty Wallet has thousands of interlocking plastic fibers that creates a “paper” wallet which is durable, thin, tear-resistant and water-resistant. Made from a single sheet of Tyvek, the Mighty Wallet is a slim, folded, eco-friendly, and vegan alternative to old-fashioned bulky wallets. The Mighty Wallet is 100% recyclable, has no animal by products or plant matter, and is a long-lasting sustainable choice for those who care about the future of our planet. negative_passages.text: Product Description XTERRA Fitness provides everything you require to reach your fitness goals in the TR folding treadmill. Offering a wide variety of workout programs, you can now realize your health and conditioning ambitions. Thanks to its sturdy frame and powerful motor, the TR150 and TR260 treadmills are built to keep up for as far as you can push yourself. The widescreen LCD display enables you to easily monitor information such as your pulse, speed, distance, time, and calories burned. Hand pulse sensors are conveniently mounted on the handlebars to keep you in your training zone. XTRASOFT deck cushioning technology provides maximum impact absorption, minimizing the stress on your joints and providing a more comfortable workout. Accessory holders are integrated into the console to conveniently hold your phone, water bottle, remote control, and more. When your workout is complete simply fold up the deck and move it out of the way with built-in transport wheels for easy storage. negative_passages.title: ApexDesk 60" Elite Height Adjustable Desk w/Cabinet Bundle (Black Desk/Black Cabinet)
negative_passages.text: Product Description The Apex Desk Elite Series Height Adjustable Desk distinguishes itself in many ways and is a big bang for your hard-earned buck: >➢ Stability – The underframe is constructed with one-piece center beam for added stability. It is more stable than many desks that have a crossbar. >➢ Crossbar-Free – It allows more leg room and flexibility of adding an exercise bike/treadmill by some users. >➢ Ease of Assembly – Most users get it up and running in less than 45 minutes, thanks to the screw-less design that uses levers rather than screws to secure beam to the lifting columns. >➢ MDF Desktop – Most desks in our price range are constructed with low-grade particle board. negative_passages.text: Product Description Product Description The Exerpeutic TF1000 Walk to Fitness Electric Treadmill is an effective way to burn extra calories and achieve a healthy lifestyle. Walking on the Exerpeutic TF1000 is one of the easiest and most effective ways to achieve a regimen of regular exercise. Unlike outdoor walking, treadmill fitness walking has the benefits of shock absorption and the convenience of exercising in your own home, in front of a TV or just listening to your favorite music. Walk to Fitness can help you lose body fat, tone muscles and is a great way to stay in shape. As for assembly the Exerpeutic TF1000 is virtually assembled out of the box. Attach the computer and you are ready to go So go ahead and try the Exerpeutic TF1000 It can take the punishment The Exerpeutic TF1000 has been tested up to 400 lbs user weight, allowing you to walk your way to fitness at any age and body size. It comes with a 1.5 Horse Power High Torque Motor. The motor utilizes “Quite Drive” which reduces any noise when walking so that there is no sound interference with your TV or music. Speed adjusts in increments of 1/10’s mph up to a maximum of 4mph. The treadmill belt has been widened to a fitness club size of 20” for safety and security along with Extra long 18” safety handles that are 2x the standard length. The frame has been reinforced to accommodate a high weight capacity capability with wide side rails for a foot platform, if needed. Speed control buttons and on/off buttons are on the handle bars for convenience. Folds up easily for storage and can be wheeled around. The LCD display window features elapsed time, distance walked, calories burned, speed and pulse monitoring. With a 5 year Warranty: 5 Year motor warranty, 1 year frame, 90 days parts and labor how can you go wrong? Get fit on your own schedule with the Exerpeutic TF1000 electric walking treadmill. The TF1000 is expressly designed for walkers, with an adjustable speed up to 4 miles per hour in 0.1 mph increments. Construction-wise, the TF1000 includes a reinforced frame that's been tested for a user weight up to 400 pounds, along with wide side rails that acts as a foot platform if necessary. It's also easy to track your workout progress via the LCD display, which monitors your elapsed time, distance walked, calories burned, speed, and pulse. And you easily move the treadmill just about anywhere, as the TF000 includes a folding frame and bottom wheels. negative_passages.title: Tripp Lite TLP76MSG 7 Outlet (6 Individually Controlled) Surge Protector Power Strip, 6ft Cord, Lifetime Limited Warranty & Dollar 25K Insurance
negative_passages.text: Product Description Tripp Lite's TLP76MSG offers reliable, Green surge technology that protects your computer and peripherals as well as the environment and your wallet. Energy-saving outlet configuration reduces energy waste (phantom loads) by cutting AC power to unused peripherals. The TLP76MSG has one always on outlet for those peripherals that need constant power like a fax machine, DVR or router. It also offer convenient, individual outlet switches that allow users to select which device is turned on and off. The TLP76MSG has 7 total outlets, 6 foot cord and diagnostic LEDs to warn of wiring problems and suppressor damage. Network-grade AC suppression rated at 1080 joules shields equipment from surges and line noise. Designed with an attractive cool gray suppressor housing, the TLP76MSG can accommodate up to 4 transformer plug outlets offering convenient protection of desktop computer equipment and accessories. Lifetime warranty with $25,000 connected equipment Insurance (USA & Canada only). negative_passages.text: Product Description Add intensity to your training on the Preforms Performance 600i Treadmill. Let expert personal trainers guide your machine’s speed and incline as you follow them through beautiful locations around the world on the built-in 10” Smart HD Touchscreen. With Quick Speed and Quick Incline Controls, you’ll be able to run up to 10 MPH at up to a 10% incline grade at the touch of a button on the 2.5 CHP motor that was built to last. *Continuous Horsepower ("CHP") is a term used in the treadmill industry for consumer comparison purposes. The CHP rating is measured in laboratory testing using a dynamometer, which measures the mechanical power of the motor. The CHP rating does not denote the operational horsepower of the treadmill in ordinary household use. In ordinary household use, the motor does not operate at the horsepower shown. negative_passages.title: Sole E35 Elliptical Trainer (2009-2010 Model)
negative_passages.text: Product Description Product description Easy to use electronic console with blue backlight LCD display. Includes a built-in cooling fan and water bottle holder. Fluid natural motion provided by a whisper quiet drive system. The combination of a heavy 30 lb. flywheel and a high gear ratio not found on comparable models means an extremely smooth feel with plenty of resistance at the top end for a machine that will provide a challenging workout. Upper body exercise provides a total body workout. Stationary handle bars with built-in pulse sensors for monitoring your heart rate. A heart rate chest strap is also included for hands free pulse monitoring and heart rate interactive programs. Oversize foot pedals for a comfortable workout. These unique foot pedals were designed in collaboration with a leading physical therapist and sports enthusiast. Sole engineers have designed in a 2 degree inward slope to the foot pedals which reduce ankle and knee stress that is common in other elliptical machines. The four real wheels which ride on heavy duty rails provide a smoother more stable feel and reduce side to side foot pedal motion. A feature found only on more expensive models Amazon.com Enjoy an efficient full-body workout without heading to the gym with the Sole E35 elliptical trainer. Boasting a heavy 25-pound flywheel, a high gear ratio not found on most comparable models, and a pair of upper body handles, the E35 delivers an extremely smooth workout with plenty of top-end resistance. Users will also appreciate the unique oversize foot pedals, which were designed in collaboration with a leading physical therapist and sports enthusiast. The pedals are not only extra large, but also feature a 2-degree inward slope that reduces the ankle and knee stress that's common in other elliptical machines. And thanks to the stationary handle bars with built-in pulse sensors, it's a breeze to monitor your heart rate as you exercise (a chest strap is also included for highly accurate wireless monitoring). Workout specifics include 16 resistance levels, ten total programs (including one custom program), and a 20-inch stride length. Perhaps the handiest feature from a user perspective, however, is the easy-to-use electronic console, which integrates a blue backlit LCD display, a cooling fan, and a water bottle holder. The E35, which offers a maximum weight capacity of 350 pounds, carries the following warranties: lifetime on the frame and brakes, five years on all parts and electronics, and two years on the labor. Specifications: The E35's LCD display will track your key workout metrics. Assembled Dimensions: 82 by 27 by 68 inches (L x W x H) Stride Length: 20 inches Front Drive Steel Frame: 38mm Resistance Type: Eddy Current Braking Adjustable Pedals Articulating Pedals Flywheel: 25 pounds Resistance Levels: 16 Power: Plug in Upper Body: Yes Pulse Grips: Yes Handlebar Adjust: Yes Display Type: Small LCD Heart Rate Control Heart Rate Telemetry Belt Track Display Color: Backlit Blue Audio System Incline: Power Six Standard Programs Two User-Defined Programs Two Heart Rate Programs Cooling Fans: Standard Water Bottle Holder Rear Rail Shroud Weight Capacity: 350 pounds Manufacturer's Warranty frame and brakes - lifetime, parts / electronics - 5 years, labor: 2 years About Sole Sole brings over twenty years of treadmill and fitness product design and manufacturing to the table in their line of innovative equipment designed for fitness-conscious people. The company's treadmill line is simple in design, with an emphasis on quality and warranty all at a great price. Sole's easy-to-use treadmills offer a great value and feature a convenient, space-saving portable design. The treadmills have a very stable base with four wheels for ease of movement, folding decks to conserve space, and a 30-year motor and lifetime deck and frame warranty. Sole is always looking for ways to make their equipment better, more efficient, with higher quality at a great price. About Elliptical Trainers Elliptical trainers represent the next wave of advancement in low-impact cardiovascular exercise machines and continue to grow in popularity. By simulating motions experienced through walking, stepping, cycling, and skiing, elliptical machines allow for a smooth and fluid motion while building strength in the arms and legs. Similar to the exercise position for treadmills, elliptical trainers are used by standing in an upright position while holding the handrails of the machine. With elliptical trainers, however, your feet remain in the foot pedals throughout the exercise regimen and circulate in a smooth and seamless motion, resulting in little to no impact on the knees, back, and hips. Elliptical trainers are compatible for all ages and fitness levels and allow you to select the difficulty level through the incline and intensity settings. Additionally, elliptical trainers allow you to determine the complexity of your workout based on your needs, all while listening to music, watching television, or reading a magazine while exercising in the comfort and safety of your own home. Although different types of elliptical trainers offer an assortment of features, many of them include an array of challenging programs, forward and reverse directional movement, EKG grip pulse handles, a lightweight portable design with easy fold-up capability, and a monitor displaying calories burned, distance, speed, time, and heart rate. Other types of exercise machines, namely treadmills and bikes, offer excellent cardiovascular exercise and muscular training for the legs in a forward-motion exercise. Elliptical trainers take this to the next level by offering an upper and lower body workout with dual motion, challenging and diverse programs, and a low-impact exercise machine that won't strain sensitive joints. Product Description Window envelope helps to ensure your documents arrive at their proper location. Self-stick adhesive—double flap design keeps flap from sticking until ready to mail. White wove exterior adds a professional touch.From the manufacturer The Quality Park Advantage Quality Park envelopes offer a comprehensive selection of business envelopes with superior features. We work tirelessly to give you the best for your hard-earned dollar, carefully designing envelopes with time-saving convenience features and high quality materials that still keep your budget in mind. You get a quality product with Quality Park affordability. Read more #10 Left Window Security Tinted Business Envelopes with Self Seal Closure Enhanced Privacy Features Protect sensitive client information with these security tinted envelopes. The reflex blue pattern lining the envelope's interior makes it impossible to see the details of the contents, even when held up to the light. Mail invoices, statements and other important documents with confidence. Redi-Seal Self Adhesive Closure With the Redi-Seal closure, envelopes do not require moisture to seal. The unique double-flap design keeps the gum from sticking before use. Simply raise the lower flap and press to seal. Convenient Left Window Instead of printing the contents and the envelopes with an address, use the window to show pertinent information. Display the receiver addresses through the window. Positioned to fit most invoice address layouts, this left side window envelope makes sure the document is delivered straight into the customer's hands! The window (1-1/8" x 4-1/2") is positioned 7/8" from left and 1/2" from bottom. Designed for standard business mailings Substantial 24 lb. White Wove Paper Measures 4-1/8" x 9-1/2" Side seam design for easy insertion 500 envelopes per box Read more Left Window Security Tinted Business Envelopes with Self Seal Closure #10, 24 lb. White Wove, 4-1/8" x 9-1/2", 500/Box, (21418). Read more Styles and Features Business Envelopes Quality Park envelopes are a trusted staple in the office, providing hundreds of business-ready envelope styles in sizes and weights to fit every need and industry. We offer the standard #10 envelopes you rely on for direct mail and correspondence; security-tinted window and double-window envelopes to fit billing statements, paychecks and receipts; claim form envelopes for hospitals and physicians; and every business need under the sun. Mail more economically and efficiently with quality stock and quality features from Quality Park envelopes. Enhanced Security Protect yourself and customer/client data with security features that keep personal information confidential while in transit. A security tint makes envelopes difficult to see through; a complex security pattern scrambles the appearance of text for added protection. Use to shield social security numbers, PINs, checks, statements, invoices or health data. Convenient Self-Sealing Closures Redi-StripP envelopes increase efficiency with removable strips and adhesives that seal without moisture—simply peel and press. These time-savers eliminate the hassle of everyday and large bulk mailings. Plus, the peelable strips protect resin adhesives from dust, so envelopes last longer in storage. Redi-Seal no-moisture envelopes have a unique double-flap closure that prevents adhesives from sticking prematurely. You won’t find ruined envelopes in your box! Read more Announcement Envelopes Lest you think we’re all business, Quality Park A-style announcement envelopes provide quick, cost-saving alternatives for invitations & announcements. You’re in full control of event costs with quality paper selections at a Quality Park price; perfect for when your budget and your timeline are tight. Catalog and Booklet Envelopes Our horizontal and vertical envelopes have closures to suit every purpose. Large envelopes have heavy adhesives to protect bulky contents. Durable metal clasp, string-and-button and resealable-tape styles offer an economical solution for inter-office mail. From jumbo envelopes with gummed or plain flaps, to coin envelopes for keys, you’ll find just the right closure at Quality Park. Read more

negative_passages.text: Product Description Office Elite’s #10 Double Window Speed Seal Security Envelopes Premium quality, unparalleled value, and maximum protection—guaranteed to fit QuickBooks invoices and statements as well as other computer-generated invoices perfectly, with enough room to include multiple invoices or statements at once! Mail your invoices and statements with confidence and style. Our #10 envelopes feature an ultra-strong adhesive strip and elegant 24-pound white wove paper stock—they’re easy to use and engineered to deliver a secure, hassle-free mailing experience. The use of double-window self-seal security envelopes for business documents is beneficial for both the sender and the recipient—a few of these benefits are: Double-Window Design Is a Time Saver These no 10 window envelopes are ideal for most standard computer-generated invoices. Send up to 550 invoices quickly and easily! Perfect for Businesses and Small Business Owners Everything about this envelope—from the window placement, to the speed seal strip, to the security pattern—has been designed with QuickBooks users and business owners in mind, making the process of mailing invoices and statements easy! Added Privacy and Security Thick 24 lb. white wove paper and a powerful security pattern protect your private information as well as your clients’ personal information while in transit—mail invoices with confidence knowing that your sensitive data is protected! High Quality Strip-and-Seal Adhesive A speed seal flap with our top-of-the-line adhesive ensure that these envelopes are easy to use while providing an ultra-strong, permanent seal. negative_passages.title: DuPont Tyvek StraightFlash Single-Sided - 4" x 150' - 1 Roll
negative_passages.text: Product Description DuPont StraightFlash for residential window flashing is ideal for protecting heads and jambs of rectangular windows. By bridging the interface between the rough opening and building envelope, DuPont StraightFlash protects these vulnerable areas that are subject to potential water damage. DuPont StraightFlash is a premium, self-adhered flashing made with DuPont Tyvek and a 100% butyl-based adhesive layer. This makes for a durable, premium window flashing that helps protect rain from entering around window openings in residential and commercial structures. StraightFlash flashing combines a DuPont Tyvek topsheet with a 100% butyl based adhesive layer. This allows it to combine the strength, durability, and water resistance of Tyvek material with the convenience and flexibility of a self-adhered flashing. When used as part of a DuPont Building Envelope system, DuPont StraightFlash door and window flashing can also help contribute towards U.S. Green Building Council LEED points. Qualified to several key industry-approved standards, including AAMA 711-07 Voluntary Specification for Self Adhering Flashing Used for Installation of Exterior Wall Fenestration Products.The result: premium door and window flashing protection that keeps rain out, and is designed to integrate with all other DuPont air and water barriers, as part of a building envelope system.
